title: Meta Ads Video Editor
description:
We’re hiring a Meta Ads Video Editor who can edit fast, think in hooks, and use AI tools to speed up production and improve output.



What you’ll do

 • Edit short-for
ta ads 

 • We work in bundles of 3 videos:

 • All 3 videos have the same body + CTA

 • Only the hook changes (different first 1–3 seconds / different intro angle)

 • Source raw footage yourself when needed (TikTok, YouTube, creators, etc.) and also create new footage using AI when required (AI b-roll, AI scenes, AI visuals) to support hooks and variations

 • Add/subtitle like a pro (clean, readable, mobile-first)

 • Tight pacing, strong first seconds, pattern interrupts, scroll-stopping edits

 • Deliver organized files (naming, versions, exports)



What we need from you

 • Strong short-form editing skills (UGC / direct-response style)

 • You work with AI (examples: AI captions, voice tools, AI b-roll, AI cleanup, AI upscaling, AI scripting support, etc.)

 • You understand Meta ad performance basics (hook rate, hold rate, CTR mindset)

 • Fast turnaround + consistent quality

 • You can take feedback and iterate quickly



Tools 

CapCut / Premiere / After Effects / DaVinci  as long as the output is top-tier and fast. 

AI tools are a big plus :  Arcads



 payment

 • $50 per bundle of 3 videos (same body/CTA, different hooks)

        •.      Performance bonus: 5% of the profit if the profit is generated from this video (i.e., when this creative is the one driving the results)

title: AI Video Graphic Designer (VEO 3 / Sora AI Specialist)
description:
About the Role

We are seeking a highly creative and technically skilled AI Video Graphic Designer with hands-on experience using VEO 3 or Sora AI to produce cinematic, high-quality AI-generated videos for marketing, advertising, and social media campaigns. This role is ideal for someone who understands prompt engineering, storytelling, and advanced AI video workflows, and can turn creative concepts into engaging visual content.



Key Responsibilities:

- Create high-quality AI-generated videos using VEO 3 or Sora AI

- Develop detailed prompts to achieve cinematic and realistic outputs

- Plan and structure AI scenes, sequences, and visual storytelling

- Edit and enhance AI-generated footage using professional video editing tools

- Add motion graphics, captions, transitions, and sound design

- Collaborate with the marketing or creative team on campaign concepts

- Optimize videos for different platforms (Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, Ads)



 Required Skills & Qualifications:

- Proven experience using VEO 3 and/or Sora AI

- Strong prompt engineering skills for AI video generation

- Experience with video editing software (Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects, CapCut, etc.)

- Strong sense of composition, pacing, and storytelling

-Understanding of social media video formats and trends

- Ability to meet deadlines and manage multiple projects



Preferred Qualifications:

- Experience creating AI-powered marketing ads

- Motion graphics and animation skills

- Experience with AI voice generation or sound design tools

- Background in branding or digital marketing



To apply, please submit:

- Portfolio showcasing AI-generated videos (Required)

- Links to projects created using VEO 3 or Sora AI

- Brief explanation of your AI video creation workflow

title: Financial Operations Manager (Proactive & Hands-On)
description:
We are a small but growing business (£15k/month revenue) looking for someone to fully own our financial operations.

This is NOT basic bookkeeping.



You will:

- Reconcile all accounts weekly (business + personal/joint)

- Send and manage invoices

- Chase overdue payments professionally

- Set up and improve financial systems (FX accounts, payment processors, etc.)

- Cancel unnecessary software

- Flag overspending

- Create monthly P&L and cashflow reports

- Maintain a rolling 90-day forecast

- Proactively suggest improvements



You must:

- Take initiative without being told

- Be confident chasing clients for payment

- Be obsessive about financial cleanliness

- Think like an owner

- Care about cash discipline



To apply:

1. Record a 2-minute Loom explaining how you would improve cashflow in a £15k/month service business.

2. Show a financial report you have created.

3. Tell me how you would reduce overdue invoices by 50%.

Key Responsibilities

• Design 10–15 Instagram carousel posts per month in line with our brand templates and guidelines

• Produce visually compelling, clear, and on-brand graphics that resonate with a fitness and shift worker audience

• Manage your workload independently, delivering files on time and to the agreed brief

• Communicate proactively with the team regarding timelines, revisions, or any queries

• Incorporate feedback efficiently and maintain consistency across all content

title: Elite Appointment Setter for Fast-Growing NYC Med Spa, Full Time, Long Term
description:
ABOUT US



ZZ Med Spa is a fast growing medical spa company based in Manhattan, New York. We operate multiple Day Spa and Med Spa locations and currently employ over 80 tea
mbers across our organization.



We are expanding our Appointment Setting team and are looking for experienced, confident professionals who are serious about long term work and performance.



ROLE OVERVIEW



As an Appointment Setter, you will be responsible for contacting leads, booking appointments, and maintaining accurate CRM records. This role requires urgency, strong communication skills, and the ability to confidently guide prospects toward scheduling.



This is not an entry level role. We are looking for individuals with real outbound experience who understand follow up discipline and conversion.



KEY RESPONSIBILITIES



• Conduct high volume outbound calls and SMS outreach to potential customers

• Contact new leads immediately and follow up consistently

• Schedule qualified prospects into our calendars

• Maintain accurate and detailed CRM records

• Handle objections professionally and clearly explain service benefits

• Track daily metrics including call volume, conversion rates, and appointments set



REQUIREMENTS



• Minimum 3 years of experience in appointment setting or outbound sales

• Excellent spoken and written English with clear pronunciation and confident delivery

• Strong persuasion and objection handling skills

• Experience using CRM systems and Microsoft Office

• Organized, disciplined, and goal oriented

• Reliable high speed internet and a professional work environment

• Available full time during New York business hours



WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR



We are seeking candidates who are confident on the phone, proactive in follow up, and comfortable working in a performance driven environment. You should be resilient, coachable, and motivated by results.



Qualified candidates will be contacted for the next step in our screening process.



We are planning to onboard quickly.





APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS



To be considered, please include the following:

1. The total number of years you have in appointment setting or outbound sales

2. A short voice recording introducing yourself and summarizing your relevant experience

3. Your updated resume

4. Write “NYC” in the subject line of your application so we know you read the full job description.



Applications that do not follow these instructions will not be reviewed.

title: Social Media Growth & Engagement Specialist
description:
The Mission

Apex-Emerald-AI is an automation-first agency. We have the content and the tech; now we need the human engine to spark the conversations. We aren't looking for a "VA" to do data entry—we are looking for a Growth Scout to find the right rooms, add value, and pull high-intent leads into our automated ecosystem.



There is NO cold calling required. Your job is "Social Warming." You find the leads; our automated systems handle the calls.



Your Key Responsibilities:

Strategic Infiltration: Join and monitor specific industry groups (UK & UAE focus) on LinkedIn and
 as directed.



Authority Building: Engage with industry leaders and prospects by commenting and providing genuine value (no spam).



Growth Tracking: Proactively grow our follower base across LI, Instagram, FB, X, and TikTok.



The "Trigger" Hand-off: Identify high-intent engagement. The moment a prospect asks a "How-to" or "Discovery" question, you capture their details and flag them for the Founder.



Daily Reporting: Provide a concise EOD (End of Day) report on follower growth and "Hot Leads" generated.



Requirements:



An Expert in all Social Media channels



UK & UAE Market Fluency: You must understand the cultural nuances of doing business in London and Dubai.



High-Level English: Your writing must be professional, sharp, and "human"—not robotic or templated.



Social Native: You know how to navigate LinkedIn, X, and TikTok algorithms to get eyes on content.



Initiative: You don't wait for a script; you spot an opportunity and engage.



Compensation & Growth:

Base Pay: Competitive part-time hourly/monthly rate (to be discussed).



The  Bonus: You get a direct financial bonus for:



Every Qualified Conversation handed off to the Founder.



Every Closed Deal that originated from your outreach/infiltration efforts.



Career Path: This is a part-time role with the immediate potential to grow into a full-time as role as Apex-Emerald-AI scales.



How to Apply (Strict Requirements):



This is NOT a role for a first-time VA. To be considered,
 your CV to: 
 with the following:



Proof of Experience: Provide a written referral or case study for 3 past employers or projects where you successfully grew a social presence or generated B2B leads.



The Comparison: Briefly explain the main difference in "tone" you would use when messaging a CEO in London vs. a Business Owner in Dubai.



The Infiltration: Identify two specific LinkedIn groups (one UK, one UAE) that would be high-value for an AI Automation agency to find clients.



The Bridge: A prospect in a group asks: "I have too many leads and I can't keep up with the follow-up. Any advice?" Write the 2-sentence comment you would post to get their attention without sounding like a salesman.

title: Lead Generation & Social Media Growth Specialist
description:
The Mission

We are looking for a proactive, growth-minded Social Media & Lead Generation Specialist to aggressively expand our presence within the Home Services sector (Plumbing, Electrical, HVAC, Construction, etc.) across the UK, Ireland, and the UAE.



You are not just a "poster"; you are a "hunter." Your goal is to find our Ideal Customer Profile (ICP), engage with them authentically, and bridge the gap between social media interest and a booked meeting for our team.



Key Responsibilities

Targeted Growth: Execute daily follow/request strategies across LinkedIn, Instagram, FB, X, and TikTok.



Community Mining: Join and engage in specific trade groups (e.g., Plumbing & Heating, Heat Pumps, Attic Conversions) while strictly obeying group rules.



B2B Lead Sourcing: Monitor Indeed job alerts for "Receptionists" or "Inbound Sales" to identify scaling companies in our target sectors.



Content & Engagement: Use our provided scheduling tool to maintain a consistent presence and monitor ManyChat for all automated responses (likes, follows, comments).



Precision Outreach: Use approved templates to DM relevant businesses, adapting the tone to be professional yet "local" to the UK/Ireland/UAE markets.



The Clean Handoff: Escalate any warm leads or direct inquiries immediately via WhatsApp to Dave and Dylan with full lead details.



Daily Reporting: Complete a daily sign-off sheet tracking follower growth (start vs. end of day) and total engagement metrics per channel.



Mandatory Requirements

Verifiable References: You must provide written references including a LinkedIn profile or company
 for your previous employer.



Technical Setup: Must have a stable internet connection (20Mbps+) and a backup power solution.



Account Safety: Experience using VPNs or Anti-detect browsers (AdsPower/Dolphin) to manage UK/Ireland accounts safely from overseas.



Tone of Voice: Ability to communicate in a concise, "Western Business" style (no overly formal "Dear Sir/Ma'am" templates).



Growth Mindset: We are looking for someone who pursues the ICP aggressively and doesn't just "wait for instructions."



Working Hours & Trial

Trial: 1-week Paid Trial to assess quality of leads and communication.



Hours: Starting at 3–5 hours per day, scaling up to full-time as the workload and results increase.



Timezone: Must be available to overlap with UK/Ireland/UAE business hours.

title: Construction Project Manager Assistant
description:
Stone Horizon is a growing construction company based in Victoria, Australia, specialising in the development of rooming houses. We are currently looking for a highly organised and proactive Construction Project Manager Assistant (Remote – Philippines) to support our Project Management team in the coordination and administration of multiple residential construction projects.



This role is ideal for someone detail-oriented, reliable, and comfortable working in a fast-paced construction environment, with strong administrative and coordination skills. You will play a key role in ensuring smooth project execution by assisting with documentation, supplier coordination, utilities, and site-related administrative tasks.



Key Responsibilities (Overview):





Project Coordination & Administration: Supporting the Construction Project Manager with overall project documentation, records management, and administrative tasks across multiple construction projects.



Supplier & Trade Liaison: Communicating with suppliers, consultants, and trades, coordinating quotes, documentation, specifications, and deliveries.



Compliance & Utilities Management: Assisting with permits, council and utilities paperwork, notices, and general compliance-related processes.



Site & Logistics Support: Coordinating site services, early-stage setup, hires, and general operational logistics to ensure smooth project progression.



Procurement & Financial Support: Raising purchase orders, assisting with invoices per stage, and supporting procurement and cost coordination.



What We Are Looking For:



Previous experience assisting with construction administration, project coordination, or a similar role (preferred)



Excellent organisational and time management skills



Strong written and verbal English communication



High attention to detail and ability to follow processes



Ability to manage multiple tasks and deadlines



Proficiency in Microsoft Office, Google Workspace, and
 communication



Experience working remotely with international teams is a plus



About Stone Horizon:

At Stone Horizon, we specialise in the construction and management of rooming houses across Victoria, Australia. We are a dynamic and growing organisation focused on efficiency, innovation, and high-quality project delivery. By joining our team, you will work closely with experienced project managers and gain exposure to real construction projects in the Australian market.



This is a long-term remote position with opportunities for growth within the company as we continue to expand our operations.

title: Bodycam Video Editor
description:
Looking for someone with experience editing bodycam footage.



I’ll provide the footage for each case. I need someone who can go through it, pick the important parts, organize everything, and turn it into a clear, engaging story.



You should be able to:



Build a storyline from the footage



Write a narrative script and send it to me



I’ll record the voiceover myself and send it back to you



Then you edit the full video around my voiceover and finalize everything



Pay is $3 per edited minute.



If you’ve worked on bodycam, documentary-style, or similar content before, please send examples of your work.

title: Web Developer & UI Designer (Booking Systems Specialist) in Manila Freelancer
description:
The Goal: Upgrade our existing website for a private event venue into a high-converting, dynamic booking platform. We have three private rooms, and we need a seamless way for clients to check availability, fill out event intake forms, and book directly from the site.

Scope of Work:

• Dynamic Booking Integration: Set up a booking system where users can select one of our three rooms based on their event type.

• Mobile-First Design: Ensure the booking process is flawless on mobile phones (where most event inquiries happen).

• Automation: Connect the website forms to our
/Google Calendar so we get instant notifications when a room is booked.

Requirements:

• Experience with  Wix Studio.

• Proven portfolio of "Service-Based" websites with booking or e-commerce functionality.

• Location: Manila-based solo freelancer/entrepreneur preferred.

title: Google ads specialist - PPC Specialist in Manila only
description:
Scope of Work:

• Google Search Strategy: Dominate the first page for keywords like "private event rooms," "party venue," and "corporate function rooms."

• Google Ads (PPC) Management: Set up and manage high-performing ad campaigns with clear payment plans and budget management to ensure a high Return on Ad Spend (ROAS).  

• Local SEO (Google Business Profile): Optimize our Google Maps listing so we appear in the "Local 3-Pack" when people search nearby.

• Lead Tracking: Ensure that when someone clicks our ad and visits our website, we can track their inquiry/booking.

Requirements:

• Proven experience in the Hospitality or Event Venue industry.

• Expertise in both Google Ads and Google Business Profile (Maps).

• Ability to explain a "Visibility Strategy" that doesn't just waste money on clicks but brings in actual event bookings.

title: Booking & Events asistant - remote - working hours New York (EST)
description:
We’re looking for a human, Booking Assistant to handle private event inquiries for our NYC venue.

Based in metro Manila - the manager is currently here and can provide hands - on training.

Responsibilities:

- Respond to booking inquiries via
 in less then 1 Hour 

- 3 private rooms with more or less 50 guests capacity each

( response template will be provided for general info plus chat GPT)

events type: birthdays 80% - networking events 10% - comedy shows 10%

- Track inquiries, deposits, and confirmations etc

- The booking manager in NYC is available for any questions you may have - no stress for you



Requirements:

Must be fluent in English

Hospitality, events, sales, or customer service experience preferred

Detail-oriented and reliable



Note:

ChatGPT is used only to assist with language clarity and structure. All client communication must remain HUMAN  and personalized.

title: Sales Development Representative — Outreach & Growth
description:
We're Breathpage — Europe's leading website agency building digital empires for ambitious entrepreneurs. We're a remote-first team that moves fast, communicates clearly, and operates with synergy across every project.



We're looking for a Sales Development Representative who's hungry to grow, takes ownership of their pipeline, and thrives in a role where no interaction gets missed and every message is intentional so that you can be compensated as we grow with more earning opportunities on top of the base salary.



Next to Breathpage, you’ll also work closely with our CEO to support sales activities with a media/PR offer.



In this position, you will be fulfilling and overseeing sales activities that directly support a hybrid of offers. At Breathpage, we foster synergetic relationships, both within our team and with our clients, to empower each other.





# What You'll Be Doing:



Sales Outreach (Primary Focus)



- Manage daily LinkedIn outreach across multiple accounts and campaigns

- Manage Daily Outreach via
 with multiple accounts and campaigns

- Pro-actively oversee all outreach activities

- Building genuine connections with prospects



Project & Operational Support



- Manage podcast outreach and guest planning

- Help fulfill and reach out for consulting audits that we actively do

- People Case Studies to work out consulting

- Understand organizational platforms like Notion



# What We're Looking For:



- Exceptional verbal and written communication skills.

- Adaptability and pro-active behaviour.

- Flexibility & ownership

- Familiarity with LinkedIn outreach tools,
 sequencing tools and sales



What You'll Grow Into:

This role is built for someone who wants to become a Sales Manager at Breathpage. As you prove your competency and results, the ceiling rises with you. We invest in our people — if you show ownership, you'll earn leadership.



Why Breathpage:



- Remote-first, globally operating team

- Work directly with the founder on strategy and outreach

- Clear growth path from rep ? sales manager

- A brand with a real reputation — 428+ clients, 10+ industries, a platform used across the globe

- We don't micromanage (only the first few weeks)— we trust competence and want you to grow personally and professionally



## Compensation & Setup:



- Flexible working hours during morning/afternoon CET times

- Roughly 4-6 hours a day for 4-5 days in the week

- Base salary of $500 (paid through Wise or Crypto)

- Payments done monthly, during your set up you will get a payment for first two weeks and after adjust to monthly schedule

title: EXPERIENCED | Static Ad / Image Editor & Creator | Graphic design | Hard-Working & Creative
description:
We hire only the best performing VA's that have a long-term vision when applying.

Innovation, growth and hard-work is what we believe, character comes first.





If you love design, creativity, and pushing yourself to grow, keep reading.



+ We’re looking for someone who is:

-Responsible and consistent

-Extremely attentive to visual details and aesthetics

-Creative-minded and always curious to improve their design skills

-Comfortable in graphic design

-Comfortable using AI as a productivity or creative assistant

-Always looking for ways to uplift the company, not just doing the work but innovating it

-Going to read everything and respond with uplift

-Open to feedback and eager to improve with every project



You’ll be creating static advertisements for social media and high-quality product images for product pages, two crucial visual pillars of any e-commerce store.



We don’t care about degrees or titles. What matters is your creativity, mindset, and hunger to learn and grow.





+ What You'll Gain

- A chance to turn your creative eye into real, high-impact work seen by millions of people

- Step-by-step guidance and training on what makes ads and product visuals convert

- A healthy work-life balance with respect for your time and focus

- A stable, long-term role in a growing e-commerce environment

- Flat starting rate with clear growth opportunities and performance-based bonuses

- 20 to 40 hours per week depending on your performance

- A collaborative team that values your ideas and initiative



This is not just a design job. It’s a creative growth opportunity for someone who wants to become a key visual pillar in our company.





? How to Apply ?



Please answer the questions below honestly and thoroughly.



Full Name:

Internet Speed (upload & download):

Your CV or Resume:

Your Design Portfolio (link or attachments):



Do you have experience creating static ads or product images?

Why do you think you’re perfect for this role?

How can you help our company rise up and beyond?

title: Video Editor
description: Looking for an editor for a YouTube channel consisting mostly of reaction and commentary content. Multiple uploads weekly. Quick turnarounds with light editing. Transitions, assembly, audio, and video deliverables. We mostly use DaVinci Resolve but knowledge of other NLE's is fine. Potentially live stream clipping down the line. Thumbnail design would be a plus.

title: n8n Automation Specialist — Workflows, AI & Systems (Part-Time)
description:
Breathpage is Europe's leading website agency, we build digital empires for ambitious entrepreneurs across 10+ industries globally. Behind every empire we deliver, there's an ecosystem of systems running seamlessly in the background.

We're looking for an experienced n8n Automation Specialist who can take ownership of our self-hosted n8n server, advance our internal operations, and build client-facing automation solutions that we can package and deliver as a service.



This starts part-time, but for the right person who proves their value, we are actively building this into a full-time role as we scale our automation offering to clients.





# What You'll Be Doing:



Internal Breathpage Operations



- Build, maintain, and improve automation workflows on our self-hosted n8n server

- Identify and eliminate manual bottlenecks across our sales, marketing, fulfillment, and operations

- Integrate our existing tools (CRM, Notion,
 platforms, LinkedIn, and more) into seamless automated systems

- Connect AI agents and LLM-powered logic into operational workflows where relevant



Client Automation Delivery



- Implement custom n8n automations for Breathpage clients based on their business needs

- Translate client processes and SOPs into scalable, clean workflows

- Document all workflows clearly so clients and the team can understand and maintain them

- Collaborate with the Breathpage team to identify what automation use cases we can productize and offer at scale



Strategic Growth (The Opportunity)



- Proactively surface new automation opportunities, both internal and for clients

- Help shape Breathpage's automation service offering as we develop it into a standalone product

- As volume grows, this role evolves into a full-time Automation Lead position





What We're Looking For



- Proven, hands-on n8n experience — not just familiarity, you've built and deployed real, complex workflows in production

- Ability to integrate tools like Notion, CRMs, Google Workspace,
 platforms and more

- Ownership mindset, you find the problem, you fix it, you document it

- Clear written communication



What You Won't Find Here:



- Micromanagement

- Vague briefs with no context

- A company that doesn't invest in its people



What You Will Find:



- Direct access to the founder

- A fast-moving team where your work has real, visible impact

- A role you can grow — we're intentionally building this into a full service line

- Real client projects across industries including SaaS, consulting, e-commerce, and creator businesses





Setup & Compensation:



- Hours: Part-time (~15–20 hrs/week to start)

- Rate: ~$
/month (paid through Wise or Crypto)

- Payments done monthly, during your set up you will get a payment for first two weeks and after adjust to monthly schedule





To Apply:



Please include:



1. A short description of the most complex n8n workflow you've built

2. Your experience with self-hosted n8n

3. Any examples of client-facing automations you've delivered

title: Full-Time RedTrack & Cloudflare Technical Specialist for Meta Ads
description:
???? Full-Time Technical Ads Specialist



Meta Ads | Google Ads | RedTrack | Cloudflare | Incognition

Full-Time | Remote | Long-Term Position



We are a fast-growing performance marketing business focused on Meta Ads and Google Ads.



We are looking for a HIGHLY technical person who understands tracking, domains, and ad account infrastructure at an expert level.



This is a full-time, long-term role.



???? Your Main Responsibility



You will manage and maintain our complete technical ads infrastructure.



Your tasks include:



Setting up and managing RedTrack



Managing domains inside Cloudflare



DNS setup (A records, CNAME, SSL, redirects, proxy settings)



Connecting domains to tracking systems



Setting up Meta Pixel and Conversion API (CAPI)



Setting up Google tracking (GTM, conversion tracking)



Working with anti-detect browsers like Incognition



Managing Business Managers and ad account structure



Fixing tracking issues quickly



Making sure attribution works correctly



? REQUIRED (Must Have)



You must have strong experience with:



RedTrack (very important)



Cloudflare (DNS + security + SSL)



Meta Ads technical setup



Google Ads tracking setup



Server-to-server tracking



Working with anti-detect browsers (Incognition or similar)



If you do NOT have experience with these tools, please do not apply.



? Big Advantage (Not required but preferred)



Experience in affiliate marketing



Experience with cloaking setups



VPS / hosting experience



API integrations



Automation experience



???? We Need Someone Who Is:



Very detail-oriented



Fast at solving technical problems



Independent (can work without constant supervision)



Honest and reliable



Available full-time



???? What We Offer



Full-time remote position



Stable, long-term work



Competitive salary



Performance bonuses possible



Opportunity to grow with the company



???? How to Apply



Please send:



A short introduction about yourself



Your experience with RedTrack and Cloudflare



Examples of tracking setups you built



Your expected monthly salary (USD)



When you can start





???? VERY IMPORTANT – READ BEFORE APPLYING



If you do NOT have strong, real experience with RedTrack, please DO NOT apply.



This position is 100?pendent on RedTrack.

You must be able to:



Build complete RedTrack setups from scratch



Connect domains properly



Set up postbacks and server-to-server tracking



Configure traffic sources correctly



Troubleshoot tracking issues independently



Understand attribution and tracking logic deeply



If you have only “basic knowledge” or watched tutorials, this job is NOT for you.



We are NOT looking for someone who wants to learn RedTrack.

We are looking for someone who already masters it.



If you cannot confidently handle everything inside RedTrack without guidance, please do not send an application.

title: UK Corporate Immigration – Demand & Authority Lead
description:
(Marcus Sheridan's Endless Customers | Compliance & Sponsor Licence Focus).



Immtell is a UK-based immigration consultancy specialising in:



- Sponsor licence applications

- Sponsor licence compliance & mock audits

- Skilled Worker visa strategy

- UK market entry & company formation support



We are intentionally narrowing our focus to UK corporate immigration and compliance risk, moving away from broad global mobility services.



We are looking for one senior, commercially minded operator to help lead this repositioning and build high-quality corporate demand.



This is not a social media role.

This is not a virtual assistant role.

This is not a blog production role.



This is a strategic growth role.



----



The Objective:



Increase the quality of corporate enquiries, particularly for:



- Sponsor licence applications

- Compliance reviews / mock audits

- Governance & allocation strategy



Reduce low-value, piecemeal work.



---



What You Will Own:



You will work directly with the founder and take responsibility for:



Positioning & Strategy -



- Refining Immtell’s UK-focused corporate positioning

- Defining and sharpening ideal client profiles

- Building compliance-risk narratives that resonate with corporate decision-makers



Authority-Led Content (You Create It)- 



- Writing and structuring all strategic content (blogs, landing pages, pricing content, LinkedIn drafts, etc.)

- Applying Endless Customers principles (important): Pricing transparency, Problems & objections, Comparisons, Industry disruption, and Assignment selling.

- Structuring content so it supports AI search visibility naturally (no gimmicks)



Demand & Lead Quality - 



- Aligning content with sales conversations

- Improving enquiry quality, not just increasing traffic

- Supporting targeted outreach or strategic visibility initiatives



Tools & Execution - 



You will actively use:



- priceguide.ai (pricing transparency)

- Ubersuggest (keyword research & structure)

- AI tools for workflow efficiency

- Hubspot CRM thinking aligned with sales



You must be comfortable owning both strategy and execution.



---



Leadership & Ownership (Important):



This is not a task-based role. You are expected to:



- Propose positioning changes

- Challenge assumptions constructively

- Bring strategic ideas, not wait for instructions

- Identify opportunities proactively

- Take ownership of outcomes, not just deliverables



You will not receive daily step-by-step tasks.



If you prefer clear instructions over strategic ownership, this role is not a fit.



---



The Type of Person This Suits:



You may have experience as:



- Demand Generation Manager (B2B)

- Marketing Manager (Professional Services)

- Growth Lead

- Inbound Marketing Lead

- Sales-Aligned Marketing Strategist



You think in terms of - 



- Pipeline quality

- ICP discipline

- Revenue impact

- Buyer psychology in regulated industries

- Long-term authority building



If your focus is primarily on social engagement, followers, or traffic metrics, this role is not suitable.



---



What Success Looks Like (6–12 Months):



- Clear UK corporate positioning

- Improved quality of sponsor licence & compliance enquiries

- Content actively used in sales conversations

- Greater visibility among UK corporate decision-makers

- Reduced low-value enquiries



This role directly supports revenue.



---



Requirements:



- Strong written and verbal English

- Experience owning B2B demand or marketing strategy end-to-end

- Ability to create structured, authority-led content independently

- Comfortable working directly with a founder

- Commercial mindset

- Experience in professional services, SaaS, legal, compliance, or consulting environments is preferred.



---



Working Arrangement:



- Remote 

- Full-time

- Long-term contractor role

- Monthly compensation: $2,000 – $2,500 USD depending on experience

- 90-day review period



---



To Apply:



Please include:



- How would you reposition a UK immigration firm to attract higher-quality corporate clients?

- How would you improve lead quality without simply increasing traffic?

- Provide one example of content you would create to support a sponsor licence compliance audit service.



Applications focused only on social media growth or traffic metrics will not be considered.

title: FTC & CFPB Dispute Filer
description:
?? READ BEFORE APPLYING



If you’ve never filed FTC Identity Theft Reports or CFPB complaints before — do NOT apply.

We are not training beginners.

We are building a results-driven compliance team.

We need someone who understands:

How to structure FTC reports strategically

How to file CFPB complaints that demand bureau accountability

How to track 30-day investigation timelines

How to escalate properly when bureaus fail to comply



You will be responsible for: 

Filing FTC Identity Theft Reports correctly and strategically

Drafting and submitting CFPB complaints with strong legal framing

Tracking responses from Experian, Equifax, and TransUnion

Monitoring compliance deadlines

Following up aggressively but professionally

Updating CRM and maintaining airtight documentation

Identifying violations under FCRA §§ 609, 611, 623



We expect precision. No sloppy submissions. No missed deadlines.

If you know the FCRA inside and out — keep reading.

title: Media Buyer - Meta Ads Lead Generation Specialist
description:
Accelereight is an AI and automation consulting firm helping service-based businesses implement scalable AI systems inside their operations.



We serve founder-led agencies and service businesses. Our services are high-ticket and performance-driven.



We are hiring a Meta Ads Lead Generation Specialist based in the Philippines to help us generate qualified booked calls.



This is not an ecommerce role.



Your primary objective:

Generate qualified booked calls from service business owners using Meta ads.



What You’ll Own



Launch and manage Meta lead generation campaigns



Optimize for cost per qualified booked call



Improve click-to-booking conversion rates



Test creatives and targeting aligned with our ICP



Provide weekly performance reporting and insights



Collaborate directly with the founder on performance improvements



You will be evaluated on pipeline impact, not vanity metrics.



Ideal Candidate



2+ years running Meta ads



Experience generating booked calls for service businesses



Understands high-ticket lead funnels



Comfortable being accountable to performance



Clear communicator with strong written English



Compensation



$6–$12 per hour depending on experience



3% revenue share on deals closed fro
ta-generated leads



Revenue share applies only to revenue directly attributed to Meta campaigns.



Compensation increases with performance.



Application Requirements (Mandatory)



To be considered, you must complete the following:



1. Submit a 5–10 Minute Loom Video



In your Loom, please walk through:



A Meta campaign you personally managed



The objective of the campaign



Budget range



Cost per lead and cost per booked call



What was not working initially



What you changed to improve results



Final outcome



We are evaluating clarity of thinking, not just results.



2. Complete the Performance Framework Below



Please answer the following in writing:



A. Lead Quality Strategy

If we are targeting service business owners doing $1M–$20M annually, how would you structure targeting and qualification to reduce low-quality leads?



B. Funnel Optimization

If clicks are high but booked calls are low, what are the first three things you would audit?



C. Cost Control

If cost per booked call increases 40% month over month, how do you diagnose the issue?



D. Scaling

If campaigns are performing profitably, how do you scale without destroying efficiency?



Applications that do not include Loom + written responses will not be reviewed.

title: Construction Accounting
description:
We’re hiring a Project Accountant to support construction, loan, and compliance operations across multiple affordable housing developments. If you’re detail-driven, good with documentation, and like work that has real impact, this is a strong long-term fit.



Why You’ll Love This Role



You will work directly with decision-makers — your work will be visible and valued.

You will help keep projects compliant, funded, and on schedule.

No bureaucracy, no busywork — your work directly moves projects forward.

Real room to grow into senior financial coordination or project support.



Your Typical Day

Organize and maintain project financial and compliance documentation.

Support the preparation of monthly construction draw requests.

Communicate with contractors to collect invoices, lien waivers, and documents.

Update budgets, change order logs, and payment tracking sheets.

Coordinate with lenders, accounting, and project managers as needed.



What You’ll Be Doing



1) Loan & Draw Support

Compile lien waivers, invoices, schedules, and supporting docs for draw packages.

Compare cost reports to contracts, change orders, and lender requirements.

Track soft costs (architect, engineering, inspections, interest, title, etc.).

Prepare clear, organized submission files for lenders.



2) Construction Financial Administration

Maintain digital project files (contracts, pay apps, insurance, permits, payrolls).

Track executed change orders against pay apps and budgets.

Monitor buyout logs, completion schedules, and compliance documents.

Follow up with contractors until documentation is accurate and complete.



3) General Coordination & Reporting

Maintain trackers, logs, and internal reports.

Prepare agendas, notes, and status reports for project meetings.

Communicate professionally with internal and external stakeholders.

Handle confidential financial data with discretion.



What We’re Looking For

2–4+ years in project accounting, construction admin, or loan/draw processing.

Familiarity with construction draws, budgets, or lender compliance preferred.

Proficiency in Excel and document management tools (Procore/Built/Buildertrend a bonus).

Extremely organized, detail-accurate, and accountable to deadlines.

Strong written and verbal communication skills.

Experience working for a US construction company or real-estate developer



Nice to Have

Experience in real estate development or affordable housing.

Knowledge of construction accounting.

Experience with billing using AIA G702/G703 forms.

Degree in Accounting, Construction Mgmt, Business, or related field.



TO APPLY: send a recording via 
 and answer these questions:

1.) What struck your interest about the role?

2.) Tell me about your experience in construction accounting?



SUBJECT: Construction Accounting - YOUR NAME



About Us



Atrium Housing is a mission-driven affordable housing developer with an affiliated construction company with offices in Louisiana, Florida and Texas. We don’t just build buildings — we create opportunities for families and communities. Our finance and construction teams work with lenders, contractors, and public partners to move projects from concept to completion.

title: Finance Analyst/ Account Analyst
description:
Atrium Housing is a mission-driven real estate development firm focused on creating affordable housing and vibrant communities. Our projects span mixed-finance and LIHTC transactions, and we pride ourselves on delivering high-quality, impactful housing solutions while fostering a collaborative, supportive, and growth-oriented work environment.



At Atrium, you’ll have the opportunity to learn directly from experienced development professionals, work on meaningful projects that impact communities, and build a strong foundation for a career in real estate finance and affordable housing development.



Role Purpose



As a Development Analyst, you’ll support affordable housing transactions through financial underwriting, due diligence coordination, and application support. While LIHTC experience is a plus, it is not required—what matters most is your analytical mindset, attention to detail, and eagerness to learn.



Primary Value You’ll Bring:



* Accurate underwriting and financial modeling

* Organized and reliable diligence tracking

* High-quality application support for housing agencies, investors, and lenders



What You’ll Do



* Build and maintain detailed financial models and sources-and-uses statements (LIHTC exposure is a bonus)

* Prepare rent schedules, operating pro formas, and subsidy layering analyses

* Support preparation of state housing agency applications

* Coordinate third-party reports such as market studies, appraisals, environmental studies, and surveys

* Maintain due diligence and closing checklists

* Assist with investor, lender, and internal memos



What We’re Looking For



Technical Competencies:



* Intermediate to advanced Excel skills (formulas, pivot tables, modeling)

* LIHTC fundamentals (ideal, not required)

* Strong data organization



Behavioral Competencies:



* High attention to detail

* Responsiveness and proactive communication

* Strong accountability and ownership



Qualifications:



* Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Accounting, Real Estate, Economics, Planning, or related field

* 0–3 years of relevant experience

* Strong analytical and organizational skills

* Performance Metrics

* Accuracy and reliability of underwriting

* Timeliness of deliverables

* Quality and completeness of application materials

* Responsiveness to team and project needs



Why You’ll Love Working at Atrium Housing



* Impactful work: Contribute to projects that provide affordable housing and improve communities.

* Professional growth: Learn from experienced development professionals and gain exposure to mixed-finance and LIHTC projects.

* Collaborative culture: Work with a supportive, mission-driven team where your contributions matter.

* Flexible remote work: Balance your professional growth with personal life while collaborating across time zones.



To apply, answer these questions via vocaroo and send your link.

1. What struck your interest about the role?

2. What's your experience in handling finance especially in the construction industry?

3. Attach the LINK to your updated resume.

title: Executive Assistant
description:
Primary Responsibilities

1. Project Control & Zoho Governance

Meeting Shadowing: Attend all internal, client, and sales meetings. Capture all action items and deadlines in real-time.



Task Translation: Convert the CEO’s verbal ideas and voice notes into structured project plans within Zoho Projects.



The "Monday Pulse": Run weekly audits of all active projects. Identify bottlenecks and hold Directors (and the CEO) accountable for overdue tasks.



Reporting: Generate weekly performance and KPI reports for the CEO to review business health at a glance.



2. Sales & CRM Management

Pipeline Hygiene: Manage Zoho CRM to ensure every lead has a clear "Next Step" and follow-up date.



Contract Administration: Draft and send contracts (via Zoho Sign) following verbal closes and manage the signature process.



Client Onboarding: Coordinate the transition from "Closed-Won" to "Project Kickoff," ensuring Directors are briefed and tasks are assigned.



3. Communications & PR Support

Drafting & Ghostwriting: Draft press releases, client correspondence, and internal announcements based on CEO bullet points.



Media Outreach: Manage media lists and handle the distribution and tracking of press releases.



Inbox & Slack Triage: Act as the first line of defense for the CEO’s communications, filtering for high-priority items and answering routine operational questions.



4. Strategic Calendar Defense

Time Batching: Organize the CEO’s calendar to maximize "Deep Work" time, grouping sales and consulting calls into specific blocks.



Briefings: Provide the CEO with daily "Briefing Notes" including context for upcoming meetings and status updates on pending deliverables.



Daily updates highlighting urgent tasks and prioritizing next day tasks



Required Qualifications

Expert Proficiency in Zoho Suite: Specifically Zoho Projects, Zoho CRM, and Zoho Sign.



Operations Mindset: You enjoy building systems and find "messy" environments satisfying to clean.



Assertiveness: You are comfortable "managing up" and holding a CEO accountable to their own deadlines.



Exceptional Communication: The ability to turn a 60-second frantic voice memo into a professional, multi-step project plan.



Remote Work Fluency: Expert use of Slack, Zoom, Loom, and password management tools (e.g., LastPass/1Password).



Reliability is critical in this role - EST hours



Key Performance Indicators (Success Metrics)

System Integrity: 100% of the CEO's verbal commitments are logged in Zoho within 2 hours of a meeting.



Reporting Consistency: Monday Morning Reports are delivered by 9:00 AM local time without fail.



Lead Capture: Zero sales leads sit in the CRM without an active "Next Action" date.



CEO Throughput: A measurable reduction in the CEO's time spent on administrative "checking in" vs. high-level consulting.



How to Apply

Please include a brief Loom video or cover letter detailing your experience managing a Zoho environment and how you have previously held an executive accountable.

title: Visual Storyteller | Editor
description:
Visual Storyteller | Video Editor (Remote/Hybrid)

About Re:Action



Re:Action is a cinematic brand storytelling agency. We work with ambitious startups and high-growth companies to craft brand films, campaigns, and content systems that clarify their story and drive growth.



We don’t just edit video — we design stories that move people. Now, we’re looking for a Visual Storyteller | Video Editor to join our team and help bring those stories to life.



The Role



As a Visual Storyteller, you’re not just cutting clips — you’re shaping narrative, rhythm, and emotion. You’ll collaborate with our creative team and founder to transform raw footage into cinematic short-form and long-form pieces for websites, campaigns, and social platforms.



Key Responsibilities



Edit short-form videos (30–90 sec) for social (Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn, YouTube Shorts).



Edit longer-form content (2–5 min) for brand films, campaigns.



Craft compelling narratives through pacing, music, sound design, and graphics.



Collaborate with the team on creative direction and story structure.



Repurpose existing assets into new content formats while keeping the cinematic feel.



Stay on top of editing trends, motion graphics, and social-first storytelling styles.



What We’re Looking For



Strong portfolio that shows story-driven editing, not just flashy cuts.



Proficiency in DaVinci Resolve (preferred) or Adobe Premiere Pro / After Effects.



Understanding of pacing, rhythm, and storytelling in video.



Ability to integrate graphics, subtitles, and text animations when needed.



Creative eye for detail — color, sound, and mood.



Self-starter who can work independently and meet deadlines.



Bonus: experience editing cinematic commercial work or founder-led content.



Compensation & Commitment



Freelance / Part-Time to start (with option to grow into Full-Time).



Competitive pay depending on experience.



Remote-friendly, with flexible hours as long as deadlines are met.



Opportunity to work on high-end, cinematic campaigns for startups and brands.



How to Apply



Send your CV and portfolio/reel to 
 with the subject line: “Visual Storyteller Application – [Your Name]”.

Include 2–3 examples of your strongest story-driven edits (commercial, brand, or social).

title: Accountant/Bookkeeper
description:
How to Apply:

Complete application here: 



Job Title: Accountant/Bookkeeper

Location: Remote (Philippines)

Schedule: US Business Hours (Full-Time)

Rate: $5.00 – $8.00 USD per hour (depending on experience)



About the Role

We are a US-based Home Services company specializing in Roofing, Solar, Generac, and Spray Foam. We are looking for a detail-oriented CPA to manage our daily accounting, job costing, and payroll. You will be responsible for keeping our QuickBooks Online accurate and ensuring our team is paid on time.



Key Responsibilities

- Job Costing: Categorize material and labor expenses to specific projects (Roofing vs. Solar) to track our profit margins.

- Accounts Payable (AP): Enter vendor invoices into QBO, verify amounts against purchase orders, and prepare payments for approval.

- Accounts Receivable (AR): Monitor customer payments coming in via GoHighLevel (GHL) and reconcile them in QuickBooks.

- Payroll Processing: Prepare weekly/bi-weekly payroll for our US-based employees (W-2/1099) and our international contractors using platforms like Gusto or Wise.

- Reconciliations: Perform weekly bank and credit card reconciliations to ensure the books are "tax-ready" at all times.



Requirements

- License: Must be a Certified Public Accountant (CPA) in the Philippines.

- Experience: Strong experience with QuickBooks Online is required.

- US Standards: Solid understanding of US bookkeeping and payroll basics.

- Technical: Comfortable using GHL (exporting data) and Google Workspace.

- Reliability: Must be able to work during CST business hours with a stable internet connection.



How to Apply:

Complete application here:

title: Corporate Leasing Executive
description:
This job position is BASED IN SINGAPORE




.sg



Start Something Purposeful.



At Acuvest Group, we believe in creating concepts that allow people, business and purpose to come together and thrive. We’re a privately owned real estate group dedicated to real estate concepts for industrial and commercial spaces. We are both owners of industrial properties, commercial shophouses and spaces, as well as operators of business models and concepts such as urbanspace self storage, Urbanpod workspace etc. 



We actively invest to expand our asset portfolio and grow our industrial and shophouse asset management capabilities and offerings.  



We’re looking for a Business Development and Sales Executive to bring our asset investment and management services to our clients, partners and stakeholders. 



Your Mission 



To be part of the team to grow our asset portfolio and drive performance through innovations and teamwork. 



This is a full-stack business development and sales role with plenty of room to use your skillsets in sales, strategy, innovation and execution. You’ll work with a motivated team and collaborate closely with other departments. You will report to the Business Development / Sales Director and play a critical role in the company’s performance. 



Why Join us :



- Mentored by management of a company with decades of experience in investment management, property management, development, and self-storage solutions across Singapore and the region. We combine strategic insight with innovation, offering real opportunities to grow and make an impact across a diversified real estate portfolio.



- Build an Elite Network: Connect directly with a high-value network of Corporate and SME business leaders / decision-makers, building a powerful network for your long-term career success.



- Thrive in a High-Growth Self-Storage Sector. Our self-storage business, Co-working business space, E-commerce fulfilment hubs, serve both individual and corporate clients with flexible space solutions in a fast-rising market. You’ll be at the forefront of lead generation, networking, and deal closing—driving measurable results in an expanding industry.



- Collaborative Culture. Real Career Progression. Work with experienced professionals across property and investment teams, gain exposure to full deal cycles, build strong client relationships, and accelerate your career in sales and business development at Acuvest.



Full job description : What you will be doing



Property Leasing :



- Develop and implement leasing strategies and initiatives to maximize occupancy, rental income, and tenant satisfaction



- Identify leasing opportunities and prospective tenants that align with the positioning and target market of each property, and develop relationships with tenants and prospective tenants.



- Negotiate lease agreements, including terms and conditions, rental rates, lease incentives, and lease renewals, and ensure compliance with company policies and industry standards.



- Collaborate with property management teams to conduct market research and analysis, assess competitive landscape, and identify trends and opportunities in the property market.



- Develop and maintain leasing budgets, forecasts, and reports, and track leasing activity, occupancy rates, and financial performance against targets and benchmarks.



- Manage tenant relations and communication, including addressing tenant inquiries, resolving disputes, and ensuring tenant compliance with lease terms and property rules and regulations.



- Represent the company at industry events, trade shows, and networking opportunities to promote our properties and attract potential tenants and partners.



Self storage sales :



- Work closely self storage sales team and management on drive the sales and occupancy of our self storage business.



Property Investment :



- Work closely with Management team to develop business opportunities for new property investment and development projects on a project basis.



- Unlock Potential: Identify underutilized properties and devise creative strategies to maximize their value and utility



Requirements : Who we are looking for.



- Strong business acumen and a strategic mindset. Enterprenuerial mindset



- An outgoing, optimistic personality with exceptional interpersonal skills. Strong networking and interpersonal skills.



- The ability to communicate confidently and effectively at all levels. Excellent communication skills, with the ability to build relationships and influence stakeholders at all levels.



- Minimum of 5 years of experience working experience.



- Strong understanding of leasing principles, market dynamics, and negotiation strategies in the real estate industry.



- Proven track record of successfully negotiating lease agreements, driving occupancy, and achieving leasing targets and goals.



- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to analyze market data, evaluate leasing opportunities, and make data-driven decisions.



- Results-oriented mindset with a focus on driving leasing outcomes and delivering exceptional customer service to tenants and partners.



- Ability to manage multiple projects and priorities simultaneously in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment.



- An eagerness to learn and grow through hard work and dedication

title: Counselling Psychologist / Therapist (Remote)
description:
Full Time | Remote Position | Immediate Hiring



The Healing Warrior, a U.S. wellness company seeks a Registered Counselling Psychologist / Therapist to join our expanding company in helping patients to beat cancer.



The role of the Counselling Psychologist  is to provide psychological services to our cancer patients living in the United States. This will be conducted in a remote setting, either via Zoom or phone call. This role is 100% remote.



The psychologist / therapist will work as part of an enthusiastic and supportive team to support our cancer patients towards recovery and survivorship. 





The successful candidate is required to provide the following:

 - Counselling and compassionate guidance for cancer patients

 - Emotional and psychological support

 - Support in managing fatigue, fear and uncertainty 

 - Creating safe space to process mixed emotions

 - Provide guidance in relaxation and mindfulness exercises

 - Spiritual support to build optimism and resilience

 - Conduct psychological assessment 

 - Assist Lead Therapist to deliver individual and group coaching 





Skills requirement:



1) Counselling & Coaching Skills

 - Experienced counselling psychologist 

 - Compassionate, empathetic and nurturing

 - Excellent listening skills

 - Sharp assessment skills



2) Speaking & Communication Skills

 - Fluent and proficient in English

 - Comfortable working with international clients

 - Speaks with international accent

 - Candidate should NOT have heavy Filipino accent 

 - Experienced with hosting Zoom groups meetings



3) Field Experience

 - Keen interest in health and wellness

 - Keen interest in aiding cancer survivorship and recovery

 - Medical or hospital experience is a bonus



Qualifications & Experience 

 - Experienced Psychologist 

 - Registered Therapist

 - At least 5 years of experience in clinical counselling and therapeutic work



Please review our website before applying:





If you are interested, please send in a job application here:

title: Operations & Affiliate Content Assistant (Amazon Research, Admin & Canva) – Full Time
description:
About the Role



I run a large food & lifestyle media brand (1M+ audience). We are expanding our shopping/affiliate content and I’m looking for a reliable, highly organised full-time assistant to help with product research, shopping boards, and day-to-day operational tasks.



This is a long-term role for someone who is methodical, detail-oriented and able to work independently. You will follow clear systems and checklists — not constant supervision.



This is not an influencer posting job.

It is an operations + research role with some light creative work.



Main Responsibilities

1) Affiliate Product Research & Shopping Boards



Research useful products on Amazon US



Check ratings, reviews and pricing



Build 1–2 curated shopping boards per day (8–12 items)



Write clear product titles and short descriptions



Record products in a tracking spreadsheet



Boards must be practical and helpful, not aesthetic collages.



Example themes:



toddler snack prep tools



freezer meal prep containers



quick dinner kitchen tools



lunch packing essentials



2) Administrative Support



Organise Google Drive folders



Update spreadsheets and tracking sheets



Upload and organise files



Prepare weekly reports



Maintain checklists and workflows



Assist with data entry and general business organisation



You must enjoy organisation and systems.



3) Light Canva Tasks



Simple collages/templates using provided format



Resize images



Update templates



Format graphics following instructions



(No advanced design required — accuracy matters more than creativity.)



Important



We are not looking for someone to copy other creators.

Boards and work must be:



original



accurate



organised



detail-oriented



You will be asked to explain your product choices.



Requirements



Experience with Amazon research OR e-commerce product sourcing OR VA admin work



Excellent organisation skills



Strong attention to detail



Comfortable using spreadsheets



Basic Canva knowledge



Reliable internet



Able to work independently



You should enjoy structure, checklists, and completing tasks correctly.



Work Hours & Pay



Full-time (40 hrs/week)



$400 USD/month



Long-term stable position



Expected daily output:



1–2 shopping boards



admin tasks and tracking



Paid Trial Task



Shortlisted applicants will complete a paid test task:

Create 1 sample shopping board and complete a short organisation/admin exercise.



How to Apply



Please include:



Screening Questions (Required)



Please include the following in your application:



Write the word ORANGE SPOON at the top of your application

Rate your experience from 1–10 (1 = no experience, 10 = expert) with each:



Workflow / Organization



ClickUp

Notion



Google Sheets



Amazon / Product Research

Content Tools

CapCut

Applications that do not include this section will not be reviewed.

title: Senior Sales & Appointment Setting VA – Phone Calls Required ($1,300 + Bonus)
description:
JSK Advisory is looking for a professional Sales and Appointment Setting Virtual Assistant with excellent English and proven sales experience. This is a full-time, long-term position working with professional service businesses such as accountants, consultants, and service firms.



This role will begin with outbound calling and appointment setting for JSK Advisory and will later expand into handling inbound enquiries for accounting firm clients. You will be speaking directly with business owners and professionals, so clear and confident English is essential.



This is not an admin or data entry role. We are looking for someone experienced in sales who is comfortable speaking on the phone every day and can represent professional businesses in a confident and professional manner.



Base Salary: $1,300 USD per month plus performance bonuses. Strong performers typically earn between $1,500 and $1,800 per month.



Hours are full-time at 40 hours per week.



Responsibilities include making outbound calls to business owners to introduce our services and set appointments, following up leads, handling objections professionally, and keeping CRM notes updated. You will also handle inbound calls and enquiries, respond professionally to potential clients, qualify prospects, and book appointments. You will be expected to maintain professional conversations at all times and represent our company and our clients in a positive way.



Requirements include proven experience in sales or appointment setting and strong spoken English with a clear and professional accent. You must be comfortable speaking on the phone daily and able to hold natural conversations with business owners. You must be confident, reliable, and professional in your communication. A stable internet connection and quiet working environment are required.



Preferred experience includes B2B calling, call centre or telemarketing experience, experience speaking with business owners, experience booking appointments, and experience using CRM systems.



The ideal candidate sounds confident and natural on the phone, has real sales experience, can handle objections professionally, and is reliable and organised. We are looking for someone who wants a stable long-term role and is interested in growing with the company.



To apply, please include a one to two minute video recording introducing yourself and describing your sales experience. Also include a short description of your previous sales or appointment setting roles and the types of businesses you have called before. 



Applications without a recording will not be considered.



Please answer this question in your application: If you call a business owner and they say "We're not interested right now," what would you say next?

This role is only for someone who has proven, measurable results in previous companies, thrives on taking ownership, and excels at building strong teams and systems. Since you need to have an extraordinary amount of attention to detail, please start your application with the word "leader".

title: Virtual Assistant — Voice AI & CRM Setup
description:
What You'll Do



We have template systems already built. Your job is to customize them for each new client (medical/healthcare clinics), test everything, and make sure it works perfectly before launch.



Specifically:



Customize a Retell AI voice agent for each new client — update company-specific info, scripts, and call flows using our existing template. Test voice agents thoroughly to ensure they sound natural and human-like. Set up Go High Level (GHL) sub-accounts using our template — fill in client-specific info, pipelines, and automations. Connect basic n8n automations between systems. Document any issues and report back clearly.



You're a Good Fit If You:



Have worked with Go High Level before. Are comfortable with AI tools and can learn new platforms quickly (Retell AI, n8n). Are detail-oriented — small mistakes break these systems. Can follow SOPs and templates precisely. Communicate clearly and proactively flag problems. Bonus: experience with voice AI, n8n, or API integrations.



What We Provide:



Pre-built templates for everything — you're not building from scratch. Video SOPs and walkthroughs for every step. Direct communication with the founder — no middlemen, no confusion. You'll work directly with me via Loom walkthroughs and messaging. Consistent project flow as we scale — more projects means more work for you.

To Apply



Send a short message covering:



Your experience with GHL (even if basic)

Any experience with AI tools, automation platforms, or voice AI

Your availability and preferred pay structure (hourly or fixed per project)

Start your message with the word "Template" so we know you read the full posting

title: Inbound Sales & Scheduling Specialist (Notary Services)
description:
Inbound Sales & Scheduling Specialist (Notary Services)



Prime Notary is a growing regional and nationwide notary signing service seeking a motivated, detail-oriented Client Intake & Scheduling Specialist to join our operations team. This role is critical to our daily success, client experience, and appointment conversion.



You will serve as the first point of contact for inbound client inquiries, managing calls, texts, and
s while coordinating notary signing appointments from intake through completion. This position requires strong communication skills, attention to detail, and the ability to confidently guide clients toward booking the appropriate services.



This is a stable, long-term opportunity with performance-based earning potential. The stronger your results, the more you can earn. We value consistency, accountability, and professionalism—and we invest in tea
mbers who deliver.





KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:



Manage incoming phone calls, text messages, and
s from clients and notary signing agents



Identify opportunities to convert inbound inquiries into booked appointments by confidently guiding clients toward appropriate notary services



Proactively manage outbound follow-up communications related to missed calls, missed messages, and active service requests



Schedule, confirm, and coordinate notary signing appointments with commissioned notary partners



Clearly communicate appointment details to clients and notaries to prevent errors or delays



Monitor and track the status of document signing appointments from booking through completion



Resolve client concerns or service issues professionally and efficiently



Maintain accurate and up-to-date client and notary partner records within company systems



Collaborate with operations managers and internal tea
mbers to ensure client needs are met



Conduct follow-ups to confirm appointment completion and client satisfaction



Accurately document all client interactions and transactions



Perform follow-up surveys or feedback collection to identify service improvements



Success in this role is measured by responsiveness, appointment conversion, accuracy, and overall client satisfaction.





REQUIREMENTS:



Strong phone presence with excellent English communication skills (required)



Confident and comfortable working with computers, CRMs, and online scheduling systems



Reliable internet and power; candidates must not experience frequent service interruptions



3–5+ years of customer service experience or equivalent high-volume scheduling experience



3–5+ years of sales-related experience or equivalent inbound booking experience



Excellent communication and problem-solving skills



High attention to detail with the ability to multitask in a fast-paced environment



Availability to work evening or night shifts, as business needs require

title: AI Content Creator & Community Manager (US Basketball/Sports)
description:
About Us:

We run a highly scalable social media network based in Australia. Our flagship basketball debate brand, KingVsAir, is rapidly expanding its daily output. We are looking for a hungry, detail-oriented AI Content Creator and Community Manager who lives and breathes US basketball culture and can execute a strict, high-volume content formula.



To succeed in this role, you cannot just be a casual fan. You need a deep, almost encyclopedic knowledge of the NBA, historical matchups, player stats, and the current debate culture to create content that genuinely hooks a hardcore basketball audience and drives massive comment velocity.





The Software You Will Use:



Nano Banana Pro: You will be provided access to generate images via our centralized Higgsfield Team Account so there is no cost to you. All text generation happens natively inside the prompt—no Photoshop or Canva required.



Seedance 2.0 & Topaz: You will generate high-fidelity video motion using Seedance 2.0, and then use Topaz to upscale all final video assets to crisp 4K at 60fps. (Note: Access to these external tools will be provided. Once Seedance 2.0 is available on Higgsfield, we will transition that step into our Team plan).



Google Drive & 
: 
 is our HQ for all communication, concept pitches, and draft reviews (using a simple emoji approval system). Final high-resolution assets are strictly uploaded to our shared Google Drive.





Your Daily Responsibilities:



Content Generation: Generate 5 AI images (Nano Banana Pro) and 6 short-form videos (Seedance 2.0 + Topaz upscaling) daily, strictly following our established text/image debate formulas and visual hooks.



Copywriting: Write highly engaging captions, relevant hashtags, and debate-sparking questions for each post to drive community interaction.



Asset Management: Upload all drafts to designated 
 channels for quick review, then push final approved assets to Google Drive.



Community Management: Act as a moderator for our page via Meta Business Suite. Reply to comments to boost algorithmic engagement, manage our official
 Group, and ensure our lead magnet links (wallpaper packs) are pinned in the comments as soon as posts go live.





What We Are Looking For:



Deep, obsessive knowledge of the NBA, basketball history, and debate topics (e.g., MJ vs. LeBron, peak performances, rings vs. stats). You should be able to spot a flawed basketball argument from a mile away.



Experience with AI image generation, video creation tools, and video upscaling software.



Reliability to hit the 11-post daily quota consistently.



Excellent written English for copywriting and community replies.





Compensation & Perks:



Base Pay: $400 - $500 USD per month ($100 - $125/week), paid weekly via Wise.



Performance Bonus: An end-of-month cash bonus if the page's overall Average View Duration hits our target metrics.



Buffer Time: This is a full-time, 40-hour/week role. The content generation will leave you with healthy buffer time each day to handle moderation, research, and ideation without burning out.





How to Apply:

Please reply with the phrase "Nothing but net" at the top of your application so we know you read the entire post. Include a brief summary of why your favorite NBA team will (or won't) win the championship this year, and link to any previous AI, video editing, or community management work you have done.

title: Customer Service — Inbound Support Specialist
description:
ABOUT AJ MEDIA

At AJ Media, our brands — Gekko Gifts, Purvos, and Besyner — live and die by the customer experience. We need someone who can handle high volumes of inbound support while making every single customer feel like they're our only customer. If you're a problem-solver who takes pride in turning frustrated shoppers into brand evangelists, we want you.



THE OPPORTUNITY

You'll be the first line of defense and the last line of trust for our customers. From order inquiries to returns and escalations, you'll handle it all — with speed, empathy, and an obsession for getting it right.



WHAT YOU'LL DO

Respond to inbound customer inquiries across
, live chat, and social DMs with speed and accuracy

Resolve order issues, shipping delays, returns, exchanges, and billing questions within SLA targets

Proactively turn service interactions into retention 
nts — reduce churn through stellar support

Escalate complex issues appropriately while owning the customer's outcome end-to-end

Maintain a CSAT (Customer Satisfaction Score) of 90%+ consistently

Identify patterns in customer issues and flag recurring problems to the operations team

Keep helpdesk (Gorgias or similar) organized with proper tagging, notes, and follow-up

Contribute to and maintain FAQ, help articles, and support macros



WHO YOU ARE

1–3 years of customer support experience, ideally in an ecommerce or DTC environment

You write with clarity, warmth, and professionalism — even on your toughest days

You handle high-volume queues without losing attention to detail or empathy

You're a natural problem-solver who doesn't wait to be told what to do

You're comfortable with helpdesk tools (Gorgias, Zendesk, or similar), Shopify, and basic CRM

You understand ecommerce logistics: shipping carriers, fulfillment workflows, refund processes



BONUS POINTS IF YOU HAVE

Experience with Gorgias or ReAmaze specifically

Shopify admin knowledge

Knows how to navigate Aircall



WHY JOIN US

Join a team that genuinely values CS as a growth lever, not a cost center

Performance bonuses tied to CSAT and resolution metrics

Career growth into CS Team Lead or CX Operations roles

Fully remote position with a collaborative, high-ownership culture

Work with exciting consumer brands in a high-growth environment



Sound like you? Apply now with your CV and a video introduction on why you're the right person for this role. We read every application personally. No recruiters, no generic forms — just a real conversation about whether we're a fit.



Apply here:
