title: Senior Technical Consultant & Delivery Analyst  (Product • Program • Support) - Consulting Experience Preferred
description:
ABOUT THE ROLE



I am hiring ONE exceptional Senior Technical Analyst who can handle all research, documentation, workflow mapping, requirements, meeting prep, governance artifacts, backend support and analysis behind the scenes.



You will operate as my consulting engine so I can focus on leading meetings, presenting, and driving strategy.



This is a high-skill, consulting-level role l.



You must be able to understand concepts, program governance, requirements, enterprise workflows, and technical documentation.



RESPONSIBILITIES



Program Management Support

Build & maintain RAID logs, timelines, dependency maps

Draft weekly status reports & executive summaries

Summarize meeting recordings into decisions, risks, actions

Help structure program governance documents

Track deliverables across global regions

Prepare pre-read packets and talking points

Support data readiness checklists & testing preparation

Organize all artifacts, plans, and workstreams



Product Management Platform Support

Draft PRDs, BRDs, feature specs, user stories, acceptance criteria

Document data structures (person, position, assignment)

Map organizational hierarchies and multi-entity models

Prepare workflows across structures 

Conduct competitive and market research 

Produce product briefs and capability maps

Support roadmap analysis and prioritization

Draft discovery questions & customer insights summaries



Technical / Functional Analysis



(No coding required, but strong comprehension is essential.)



Read & summarize documentation using AI

Create workflow diagrams, system flows, and integration maps

Research capabilities, configuration patterns, and data models

Prepare technical summaries for integrations & data readiness

Compare vendor features and prepare analysis decks

Translate technical content into simple, executive-friendly briefs



Executive Support & Documentation



Prepare me for every client meeting with briefs, risks, and key points

Organize notes, documents, status updates, and deliverables

Maintain structured documentation across multiple engagements

Write polished documents using AI tools

Anticipate what materials need to be prepared before meetings

Ensure I am 100% prepared for all sessions



REQUIRED EXPERIENCE (NON-NEGOTIABLE)



You must have experience in at least two of the following:



? Product Management / Product Analysis

? Program / Project Management (PMO)

? functional support

? Business Systems / Technical Analysis

? SaaS Implementation or Enterprise Systems



TECHNICAL SKILLS REQUIRED



Ability to create diagrams (Miro, L
, Whimsical)

Strong analytical writing skills

Ability to translate technical documentation into clear summaries

Experience preparing executive-level materials

Comfortable working across multiple simultaneous projects



TOOLS YOU MUST KNOW



Miro or L

Jira, ClickUp, Asana, or Monday

Google Workspace

Confluence or Notion

AI tools (ChatGPT/Claude) for drafting documentation



WORK SCHEDULE



Must work PART TIME

Must work U.S. Central Time (CST)

Long-term engagement (not short-term freelance)



APPLICATION REQUIREMENTS 



Applicants must submit ALL of the following:



1. 3–5 minute video introduction

Explain:

Product / Program / experience

How you’ve supported enterprise systems

Why you are a fit for senior consulting support



2. Resume (PDF)



3. Portfolio (At least 1 samples) - nice to have:

PRD, BRD, user stories

Status report or RAID log

Workflow diagram or architecture flow

Technical brief or research paper

HCM process documentation



4. Written Skills Assessment (provided after screening)



5. Confirmation of CST hours

title: Operations and Execution Coordinator
description:
HIRING: Operations & Execution Coordinator (Virtual Assistant)

Operations & Finance Coordinator (Remote)



PLEASE NOTE - There are screening questions that must be answered, we will not contact you if the questions are not answered.



We’re a fast-growing luxury fashion & uniform company serving hospitality, wellness, and resort clients. We run lean and are looking for a highly organized Operations & Finance Coordinator to manage our QuickBooks, HubSpot deal flow, and daily operational follow-through. PLEASE NOTE: There are screening questions at the bottom, questions must be answered to be considered. Please make sure your replies are no longer than 3 sentences for each question.



This role is for someone who loves systems, details, and closing loops. Your job is to keep our financial communication, CRM pipeline, and vendor costs accurate and up to date so leadership can focus on growth. Our founder needs help staying on top of all details and client requests. This will be your chance to really help a growing business!



Need to have experience with the following: Hubspot or Zoho, Quickbooks, Shopify, Google Drive.



Key Responsibilities

Finance & QuickBooks 

• Manage daily activity in QuickBooks (invoices, payments, reconciliation support)

• Monitor and respond to the accounting
 inbox, answering client and vendor questions professionally

• Track outstanding invoices and follow up on payments to 5 star clients, must be excellent in communicating

• Maintain clean, accurate financial records and flag discrepancies quickly



HubSpot CRM (Primary)

• Understand our business flow and work with CEO to create a deal flow in Hubspot that works for our business

Own and maintain HubSpot deal flow from Lead, Proposal,  Verbal, Closed, Production

• Clean up pipelines, update deal stages, and ensure data accuracy

• Identify missing information and follow up with the team to keep deals current

• Provide weekly pipeline summaries and status updates

Create client intake forms and contracts in hubspot



Operations & Vendor Support

• Place fabric and materials POs with approved vendors

• Track costs in detail by project and flag budget changes

• Monitor samples, timelines, and production status

• Maintain organized trackers in Google Drive/Sheets



What We’re Looking For

• Strong QuickBooks experience (required)

• Hands-on HubSpot pipeline management experience (required)

• Excellent written English and professional
 communication (required)

• Extremely organized and detail-oriented

• Comfortable owning follow-ups without reminders

• Able to manage multiple projects independently

• Experience with purchasing, vendor coordination, or cost tracking is a plus

• Experience in fashion, manufacturing, or hospitality is a bonus



Details

• Part-time (20–25 hours/week to start)

• Fully remote

• Growth opportunity as the company scales



If you’re someone who brings structure, accuracy, and ownership to operations and finance, we’d love to hear from you.



Required Screening Questions (Must Answer)

1) If a client is 60 days late on payment, please provide an example of what you would say via
 to collect payment.



HubSpot

1a. Pipeline Design (Strategy)

Our business sells B2B custom uniforms with a sales cycle that moves from inquiry to production.

If you were setting up our HubSpot from scratch, what deal stages would you create and why?

(Please list the stages and briefly explain your logic.)



1b. What questions would you ask to understand our deal flow?





2. Cleanup & Data Integrity (Execution)

You open a HubSpot account and find:

600 deals

Many duplicates

Missing close dates and deal values

Deals stuck in the wrong stages

What exact steps would you take to clean and organize the pipeline?



3. Ownership & Ongoing Management (Operations Thinking)

How do you ensure HubSpot stays accurate over time?

What rules, workflows, or habits would you implement so deals don’t become outdated or messy again?

Operations



7. Do you have experience placing purchase orders with vendors and tracking costs by project? Please describe.



8. On a scale of 1–10, how comfortable are you managing multiple projects and follow-ups independently?



9. The founder works with many clients, each project has different timelines and deliverables. How will you help the founder stay organized and ensure all tasks get completed?

title: FRACTIONAL CFO & ECOM DATA ANALYST (REMOTE)
description:
THE MISSION



You are the financial architect of the brand.



Your role is to ensure every dollar spent on Meta, TikTok, inventory, or 3PL logistics is accounted for, optimized, and producing a return. You will provide the financial “pulse” that allows leadership to scale aggressively with clarity and confidence.



Our goal is to maintain 100% financial transparency, protect a 35–40% Contribution Margin, and position the company for a $15M+ valuation.



KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

Daily & Monthly P&L Management



• Build and maintain a daily financial P&L (Net Revenue, COGS, Ad Spend, Contribution Margin)

• Monitor financial performance and identify margin fluctuations

• Detect and report money leaks (software waste, team inefficiencies, shipping overages)



3PL Audit & Logistics Analysis



• Weekly reconciliation of 3PL invoices vs Shopify raw data

• Identify billing errors, hidden fees, or overcharges

• Analyze shipping zones, weight classes, and fulfillment costs to protect margins



Inventory Forecasting & Cost Analysis



• Create 30 / 90 / 180-day forecasts aligned with growth and creative launch velocity

• Manage and optimize Cash Conversion Cycle (CCC)

• Support planning for large inventory runs: deposits, reorder timing, and cash allocation



Tax & Compliance (AU & US)



• Prepare and submit Australian BAS statements

• Assist with annual tax strategy and compliance (AU + US Sales Tax / Nexus)

• Ensure financial accuracy and audit readiness



REQUIRED EXPERIENCE



• 3+ years experience working with 8-figure DTC / e-commerce brands

• Advanced proficiency in:

    Xero

    Shopify (Advanced Reporting)

    Google Sheets / Excel (financial modeling & dashboards)

• Strong analytical mindset — able to turn numbers into insights and recommendations

• Experience working with founders and scaling brands preferred



SAMPLE WEEKLY FLOW



Morning: Input Meta/TikTok spend + Shopify sales into Daily P&L

Tuesday: Audit 3PL fulfillment report vs Shopify order IDs

Friday: Present cash flow forecast highlighting upcoming inventory deposits

Quarterly: BAS preparation + US Sales Tax reconciliation



WHY JOIN BEAUTY SLEEP CLUB



• Fast-growing DTC brand with aggressive scaling roadmap

• Work directly with founders and leadership

• High ownership, strategic impact, and growth opportunity

• Flexible remote setup with long-term potential



HOW TO APPLY



Please include:

A short intro about your e-commerce finance experience

Tools you have mastered (Xero, Shopify reporting, forecasting, etc.)

Example of a financial dashboard or forecast you’ve built (screenshot or Loom preferred)



IMPORTANT: Start your application with the phrase “Financial Clarity Drives Growth” so we know you read the full post.

title: Pitch Deck & Slides Specialist – On Demand
description:
ABOUT US

We’re a U.S.-based creative studio working with brands and creators. We build client-facing deliverables constantly (proposals, pitch decks, timelines, strategy decks, product decks). We move fast and our decks must look clean, premium, and boardroom-ready.



We need a reliable slides specialist who can produce decks on demand with fast turnaround and high attention to detail.



ROLE OVERVIEW:



You’ll take rough inputs (notes, docs, Looms, bullets, screenshots) and turn them into polished presentations that look like they came from a top agency.

This is a production role: layout, structure, clarity, visual hierarchy, consistency, speed.



RESPONSIBILITIES

Build decks in Google Slides + PowerPoint (must be strong in at least one, ideally both, or something comparable)

Turn rough content into clear slide structure (headlines, flow, hierarchy)

Create clean layouts using grids, spacing, typography, alignment

Improve slides with charts/tables/diagrams (simple + clear)

Maintain consistent styles (fonts, colors, spacing, icons)

Deliver fast iterations based on feedback

Keep a library of reusable slide components/templates for speed

Occasionally source icons/images (must understand licensing/usage basics)



WHAT “GOOD” LOOKS LIKE

Decks that are clean, modern, minimal, and premium

Sharp headline writing and slide flow (you can simplify clutter)

Fast turnaround: 6–15 slides inside 48 hours when needed

Zero sloppy alignment issues, inconsistent font sizes, or messy spacing



REQUIREMENTS (NON-NEGOTIABLE)

Proven portfolio with presentations / decks (not just graphic design)

Strong taste: typography, spacing, layout

Fluent written English (you will edit headlines and tighten copy)

Organized file management + version control

Can handle tight deadlines and revisions without drama



BONUS POINTS

Experience with pitch decks, proposals, strategy decks, timelines

Familiar with brand systems (using an existing style guide)

Can build simple diagrams (process flows, timelines, org charts)

Basic knowledge of Figma (helpful, not required)



TOOLS

Google Slides, PowerPoint, (optional: Figma / Illustrator), Google Drive, Slack



WORK TYPE / HOURS

Part-time, on-demand (flexible)

Typical workload: 5–20 hours/week depending on client flow

Must be responsive and able to take rush requests when needed



COMPENSATION

Flat Fee per Deck - deck price negotiated prior to project start. 



$3–$9/hour (depending on skill + speed)



HOW TO APPLY:



Send:

Your portfolio with deck examples (links only)

Your typical turnaround time for a 10-slide deck

Confirm which tools you use (Google Slides / PPT / Figma)

title: Senior US Tax Accountant
description:
PLEASE READ BEFORE APPLYING. This role is open only for candidates who has experience in US Taxation.



Job Description





Role Title: Senior US Tax Accountant

Shift: 07:00 AM - 03:30 PM PST

Salary: $1,700







Overview:



We are seeking a highly experienced Senior US Tax Accountant with strong hands-on expertise in U.S. federal and multi-state taxation, including extensive experience with Schedule E, pass-through entities, and real estate taxation. This role will be responsible for preparing and reviewing complex tax returns, handling advanced tax compliance and planning, and serving as a technical resource for clients and internal teams.







Key Responsibilities:



Prepare and review U.S. federal and state tax returns including:

Individuals (Form 1040)

Corporations (Forms 1120, 1120S)

Partnerships (Form 1065)

Trusts and Estates (Form 1041)

Prepare and review Schedule E for:





-Rental real estate income and expenses



-Depreciation and cost segregation



-Passive activity loss limitations



-K-1 income from partnerships and S-corporations



-Basis, at-risk, and passive loss carryforwards



-Handle multi-state filings and allocations for pass-through entities.



-Prepare tax provisions, estimates, extensions, and quarterly filings.



-Perform tax research and provide technical guidance on complex issues.



-Review fixed assets, depreciation schedules, and amortization.



-Support IRS and state audits, notices, and correspondence.



-Provide tax planning strategies to minimize liabilities.



-Communicate directly with clients regarding tax matters and compliance.







Qualifications:



Bachelor’s degree in Accounting or Finance (Master’s in Tax preferred).

CPA or EA strongly preferred.

5+ years of U.S. public accounting experience in taxation.

Strong expertise in Schedule E, rental real estate, partnerships, and S-corps.

Advanced knowledge of U.S. federal and state tax law.

Proficiency with tax software such as UltraTax, ProSystem fx, Lacerte, CCH Axcess, or similar.

Experience with multi-state and multi-entity structures.

Excellent written and verbal English communication skills.

Highly organized, detail-oriented, and able to manage multiple deadlines.

Preferred Experience:



U.S. CPA firm or large accounting firm background.

Real estate, investment, and high-net-worth individual tax clients.

Review and leadership experience managing junior staff.

Ability to work U.S. business hours and collaborate with U.S. teams.

title: Finance Director
description:
Role Title: Finance Director

Salary: $5,000/m





Job Overview:





We are seeking a strategic, results-driven Chief Financial Officer (CFO) to lead the financial operations of a high-growth, multi-entity investment and asset management firm. This executive will serve as a key member of the leadership team, responsible for driving financial strategy, ensuring compliance, optimizing performance, and enabling data-informed decision-making at the highest level.



The ideal candidate will have deep experience in financial planning and analysis, multi-entity and fund accounting, and real estate or private equity environments. Proficiency in NetSuite is required. You will be hands-on and detail-oriented while also contributing to long-term planning and financial leadership. This is an exciting opportunity to make a lasting impact in a fast-paced, innovative, and mission-driven organization.







Key Responsibilities:



Lead and oversee all financial functions, including accounting, FP&A, budgeting, reporting, audit, and compliance

Own monthly, quarterly, and annual financial reporting for leadership and stakeholders

Direct financial planning and cash flow forecasting across multiple entities and investment vehicles

Ensure timely, accurate month-end close, reconciliations, and internal controls

Partner closely with executive leadership on long-term financial strategy, fundraising, and capital planning

Oversee and continuously improve systems, processes, and automation to increase financial efficiency and insight

Coordinate with external auditors, legal, and tax professionals to maintain compliance with all regulatory requirements

Manage and mentor the finance team, fostering a high-performance and detail-oriented culture

Support due diligence, investor reporting, and fund performance analysis

Optimize the use of NetSuite and other systems to streamline reporting and decision-making





Qualifications:



- CPA or equivalent financial certification preferred

- Minimum of 5 years of experience in progressively senior finance roles, with at least 3 years in a CFO or VP of Finance capacity

- Strong experience in fund or real estate accounting, private equity, or asset management

- Proficiency in NetSuite is required

- Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite, Google Workspace, and CRM platforms such as HubSpot or Salesforce

- Proven track record in financial forecasting, budgeting, and strategic planning

- Exceptional analytical, organizational, and leadership skills

- Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities

- Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, entrepreneurial environment with competing priorities

).

• Monitor and respond to
, Instagram, and social media messages daily.

• Present pricing ($500–$2,000 services) without hesitation.

• Execute aggressive follow-up sequences.

• Manage scheduling and service calendar accurately.

• Coordinate with operations to confirm job availability.

• Track close rate, response time, and follow-ups weekly.

• Work inside GoHighLevel CRM.



Performance Benchmarks:

• 30–40% close rate on contacted hot leads.

• 90%+ same-day response.

• 100% follow-up completion.

• Zero sloppy client communication.

• Accurate calendar management with no scheduling errors.



Required Experience:

• 2+ years inside sales experience.

• CRM proficiency (GoHighLevel preferred).

• Experience managing social media inboxes.

• Comfortable handling objections live.

• Strong written and verbal English.

• Experience with scheduling/calendar coordination.



To Apply (Required):

• State your average close rate in past role.

• Explain your follow-up cadence after first contact.

• Describe how you increase conversions without discounting.

• Explain how you prioritize multiple inbound messages at once.

• Provide a 3-minute Loom explaining how you would improve a sales pipeline.

title: Disposition Specialist
description:
Disposition Specialist

Finesse Cash Offer 



Full job description



Job Description:

As a Real Estate Dispositions Specialist  you’ll play a critical role in our wholesale operations by focusing on engaging buyers, negotiating deals, and ensuring a seamless closing process. Your ability to connect with VIP clients and drive revenue growth will be the cornerstone of your success.





We are a high-performance real estate wholesale company that specializes in off-market properties. Our mission is to help homeowners & land owners in distressed or time-sensitive situations sell quickly and easily. We contract directly with homeowners/ land owners and assign those contracts to investor buyers for a fee, based on the difference between our contract price and the buyer’s purchase price—known as an assignment of contract.

We operate fast, solve problems with urgency, and are obsessed with delivering results 



Why This Role?

We’re looking for a driven, energetic Disposition Specialist who loves sales, thrives on solving challenges, and is hungry to win. This is a high-impact, high-reward role where you’ll manage property sales from contract to close—connecting the right buyers to the right deals. If you're motivated by commission and want to grow in the real estate investment world, this is your opportunity.





Key Responsibilities

• Assign purchase contracts to vetted investor buyers

• Develop and grow relationships with both new and existing buyers

• Coordinate inspections, property walkthroughs, and buyer showings

• Market properties across multiple channels 
, calls, investor networks)

• Manage buyer communication from initial interest through closing

• Negotiate terms to maximize profit per deal

• Track and manage activity in our close CRM system (Podio or similar)

• Collaborate with the acquisitions and transaction teams

• Solve problems quickly to keep deals alive and moving

• Strong communication and negotiation skills.





What We're Looking For

Required:

• Real estate or investment property experience preferred

• Sales experience in fast-paced, performance-based environments

• Strong communication and negotiation skills

• Problem solver who works fast under pressure

• Highly self-motivated and accountable

• Tech-savvy with ability to use CRMs and communication tools

• Learn and master tools such as chatGPT, InvestorLyft, constant contact, Trello for note-taking, & 
 for communication. 



Preferred:

• Strong desire to build and improve internal systems

• Leadership potential and ownership mentality

• Commission-focused mindset with long-term growth vision 



Tool Requirements:

• Laptop/desktop with at least 4 GB RAM and an i3 processor.

• Stable internet connection of at least 5 MBPS.

• USB noise-canceling headset/Webcam. 



Hours: 20 hours/week 



Rate: $2 USD an hour 



Monthly cash bonuses for getting buyers for the deals we have under contract! $150 per deal closed





How to respond to application 

Send Sample Voice Recording: saying "Im calling from Properties Surplus, we have a property for sell in an area you purchased before recently? 



Include the word "Adobo" in your response. why? This lets us see who is actually paying attention.

title: Strategic Assistant & Growth Support
description:
Role Overview

This role combines:

Pitch pipeline ownership (Upwork, Clutch in future) (40%) 

CRM and database management (Zoho) (15%)

Internal task coordination (Zoho Projects) (10%) 

Systems cleanup and legacy organization (Google Drive) (5%) 

Executive support (Gmail; Google Calendar; booking systems) (10%)

Billing and bookkeeping coordination (Quickbooks) (15%) 

Light content support (optional strong plus, blogs + linkedin + instagram +
s). (5%)





You will act as the operational backbone supporting a fast-moving founder and team.

Responsibilities & Ownership

1. Upwork Growth Engine (Full Ownership)

You are responsible for building and maintaining the agency’s Upwork pipeline.

Responsibilities:

Identify aligned
 Ads and Google Ads opportunities

Send tailored proposals daily (20-40 per work day) 

Track proposal metrics and optimize messaging

Monitor and respond to inbound messages

Book calls directly into calendar

Maintain tracking sheet of daily outreach volume

Ensure account compliance and platform best practices





2. CRM Management (Zoho CRM – Full Ownership)

You are responsible for keeping the lead pipeline organized and accurate.

Responsibilities:

Maintain and update deal stages

Ensure all proposals and leads are logged

Track proposal status and follow-ups

Maintain a clean, organized CRM structure

Generate visibility into pipeline health

Draft/send
s as needed to leads 





3. Internal Task & Workflow Coordination (Zoho Projects – Operational Ownership)

This is internal coordination, not client-facing project management.

Responsibilities:

Ensure tasks discussed in meetings are entered into Zoho

Assign tasks to appropriate team members

Apply correct deadlines and tags

Maintain clean and organized project boards

Generate weekly visibility report including:

Tasks due in the next 7 days

Overdue tasks

Blocked items

Team workload overview

Hourly breakdowns per client 





4. Billing & Bookkeeping Support (Full Ownership)

You will handle operational billing processes.

Responsibilities:

Send invoices via QuickBooks

Track payments and overdue accounts

Follow up professionally on unpaid invoices

Categorize transactions

Maintain updated books

Coordinate with the accountant when necessary





5. Database & Storage Organization (Project-Based + Ongoing Maintenance)

We are currently fixing legacy system issues.

Responsibilities:

Help figure out a legacy storage issue with Google Drive

Reorganize Google Drive and internal storage

Standardize file naming conventions

Archive outdated materials

Create clean folder hierarchies

Maintain order as the agency grows





6. Executive Assistant Support (Shared Ownership)

You will reduce founder administrative load.

Responsibilities:

Inbox triage and organization

Draft professional responses

Schedule meetings and manage the calendars

Coordinate documents and follow-ups

Assist with contract organization





7. Client Administration (Full Ownership)

Responsibilities:

Maintain contracts and onboarding documents

Organize proposal archives

Ensure documentation is complete

Keep client records structured





8. Content & Social Media Support (Optional Strong Plus)

If skilled in writing and content creation:

Edit and proofread blog posts

Format and schedule LinkedIn posts

Repurpose long-form content into shorter formats

Assist with basic social media planning

Support light social media management

Help draft captions or short-form content

Maintain clean, brand-aligned tone

Social media management and content creation experience is a significant plus, but not required.





Required Qualifications

English fluency (written and spoken)

Strong writing and editing ability

Experience with:

Zoho CRM

Zoho Projects (or similar system)

Google Workspace

QuickBooks

Upwork (preferred)

Strong organizational and systems mindset

Financial literacy

Ability to work independently

High attention to detail

Comfort working in a founder-led environment





Ideal Candidate Profile

You may be a strong fit if:

You enjoy cleaning up messy systems

You think in workflows and processes

You take ownership without constant direction

You stay calm under pressure

You care about presentation and tone

title: Client Success Manager
description:
We are Singapore’s fastest growing performance marketing agency seeking

Client Success Manager

(1 full-time, remote position available)



Do you love helping people win?



If yes — we want to hear from you.



???? Who We Are

We’re TRES, Singapore’s fastest-growing performance marketing agency.

We help speakers, coaches, and service-based business owners build and scale million-dollar offers through paid ads, sales funnels, and high-level mentoring.



We also run a powerful software called Intellia, and we’re looking for a Client Success Manager to help our users, mentees, and private clients get the results they came for — with world-class support and systems.



???? What You'll Be Doing

You don’t need to know everything before applying — if you have the attitude and aptitude, we’ll guide you through our proven systems, templates, and workflows.



Your role is to make sure clients win. You’ll be working closely with our internal team and clients to ensure they stay supported, engaged, and on track.



Client Success & Support

- Onboard new clients (software users, mentees, private clients) with our proven onboarding flow



- Track their progress and follow up if they’re stuck or inactive



- Support on coaching calls (note-taking, sending reminders, summarizing action steps)



- Monitor success metrics and improve retention using simple reporting tools



Event Management (Local & Overseas)

- Help us organise and coordinate live events — from sourcing venues to handling logistics



- Liaise with vendors, book venues, and manage client comms before, during, and after the event



- You don’t need prior experience — if you’re detail-oriented and resourceful, we’ll teach you



Community & Relationship Building

- Be the go-to person clients turn to when they need clarity or support



- Help manage our client groups and foster accountability, progress, and wins



- Cheer them on. Clients stay when they feel seen, supported, and celebrated



???? Requirements

You don’t need to tick all the boxes — if you’re confident you have what it takes, we want to hear from you.



? Strong English speaking is a must; English writing is a bonus

? Good with people, even better at follow-through

? Detail-oriented and able to juggle multiple tasks or clients

? Strong sense of responsibility and problem-solving

? Familiarity with tools like Google Sheets, ClickUp, or GoHighLevel is a plus

? Bonus: Event or client support experience in digital/marketing/coaching fields



???? Why Join Us?



Work remotely with a high-performing, passionate team



No time tracking. You work toward clear KPIs and results



Travel opportunities to support client events



You'll never feel like “just a support role” — you’ll be a key player in client wins



If you're ready to grow with a world-class team and make a real impact, apply now:

title: Media Buyer (Facebook/Meta, YouTube/Google Ads)
description:
We are Singapore’s fastest growing performance marketing agency seeking



Media Buyer (Direct Response | Performance-Focused)

Full-Time | Remote



About TRES



TRES is a Singapore-based performance marketing agency working with coaches, speakers, consultants, and education businesses across Asia. We specialise in direct-response campaigns — webinars, challenges, application funnels, and high-ticket offers — where real money is spent daily and performance matters.



We’re also part of a broader group that operates:

Play Bigger Mentoring (our education & mentoring brand)

Intellia (our proprietary GoHighLevel-based CRM & funnel platform)



All brands are owned and operated by the same team. This role sits fully within the TRES performance team.





Why This Role Is Different



This is not a branding or “boost post” role.



You’ll be working on:

- Real conversion campaigns

- Meaningful daily ad spend

- Funnels where decisions have real impact



You’ll follow proven SOPs — and you’ll also be trusted to make judgment calls when performance requires it.



If you want to grow fast by working close to real data, real money, and real decisions, this role will stretch you in the right way.





What You’ll Do



- Run and optimise conversion-focused paid ad campaigns (Meta primarily & YouTube next)

- Monitor campaign performance and flag issues early

- Own campaign health, not just execution

- Follow SOPs by default and make informed adjustments when needed

- Escalate performance issues and opportunities to the Ops Manager

- Participate in scheduled weekend monitoring for selected high-spend campaigns

- Join structured ad setup / implementation sessions for mentoring and Intellia launches (scheduled, SOP-led, execution-focused)



You’ll mainly receive all priorities and inputs from a single Ops Manager — no creative or stakeholder chaos.





What You Will NOT Be Responsible For

- Writing ad copy or designing creatives

- Redesigning funnels, offers, or pricing

- Handling client communication or account management

- Juggling multiple stakeholders or unclear priorities



Your focus is campaign performance and health, with clear boundaries and structure.





Who This Role Is For

This role is a good fit if you:

- Have hands-on experience running conversion ads (leads or sales)

- Are comfortable in performance-driven environments

- Stay calm, analytical, and accountable when things move fast

- Respect structure but don’t freeze when conditions change

- Communicate clearly and take ownership seriously



Who This Role Is NOT For

- “Set-and-forget” ad managers

- Freelancers juggling multiple clients

- People looking for a low-pressure, purely 9–5 role

- Anyone uncomfortable with responsibility tied to real spend





Compensation & Growth



At TRES, compensation is more than a monthly paycheck.



You’ll be operating in an ecosystem where:

- 6-figures are spent on paid ads monthly

- Multiple six figures are invested yearly into business, operations, education, health, and performance

- Decisions are made using real data, real risk, and real outcomes



What This Means for You

- Exposure to high-spend, direct-response campaigns

- Learn world-class media buying and direct response practices

- Grow beyond ads — into business thinking, systems, and personal performance

- Performance bonuses for strong execution and decision-making

- Opportunities to join yearly team retreats and overseas events held a few times a year



If you’re looking for comfort, this isn’t it.



If you’re looking to level up fast and grow properly, you’ll thrive here.



How to Apply

Please complete the application form carefully.



The questions are designed to understand how you think, not just what tools you’ve used.

???? Apply here:


 



Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.



Final Note

We’re not looking for button-pushers.

We’re looking for media buyers who:

Respect structure

Protect campaign performance

Take ownership seriously

If that sounds like you, we’d love to hear from you.



???? Apply here:

title: URGENT: WordPress Developer – High Availability, Page Building & Ongoing Work
description:

This is not a casual freelance role.

We need someone available, responsive, and capable of building real pages, not just fixing issues.



Engagement

Rate: USD $11/hour



Start: Immediate



Type: Hourly (not fixed-price)



Availability (NON-NEGOTIABLE)

NZ 1:00pm – 6:00pm

(Philippines approx. 8:00am – 1:00pm)



During this window:



You are at your workstation



Messages must be acknowledged within 5–10 minutes



You must be able to act on tasks in real time

Current Situation



We may not have a full SQL database backup



We do have:



WordPress XML export (pages/content)



Media/uploads



Hosting ready (Hostinger)

Fresh WordPress installs



XML imports



Reconnecting uploads



Rebuilding cleanly when needed



Week 1 Priority (CRITICAL – Main Website)

Import WordPress XML



Restore uploads/media



Build a working “Request a Quote / Book a Measure” form



Phone number clearly visible



Core pages only (Home, Services, Contact)



Leads first. Perfection later.

Build additional service pages



Assist with building a second WordPress site for our Ardex products business, including:



Product pages



Information pages



Clean, professional layouts



Ongoing fixes and improvements across both sites



Required Skills



Strong WordPress fundamentals



Page building experience (Elementor, Gutenberg, Astra or similar)



Able to create pages from briefs/content (not just follow designs)



Form setup (WPForms / Contact Form 7)



Practical, business-focused mindset



Excellent communication and responsiveness



How to Apply (IMPORTANT)



Reply with YES / NO answers only to the following:



Can you work 35 hrs/week at USD $11/hour?



Can you be online and responsive (5–10 mins) during NZ 1pm–6pm?

Applicants who do not answer these clearly will not be considered.

title: URGENT HIRING | Data Engineer
description:
IMPORTANT: If you are interested and qualified, please submit a link to your resume AND your voice recording to 
 will only process applications of those who will send both. Applications sent through OLJ will be automatically discarded. DO NOT apply if you do not have the experience.



About the Role

We are seeking a highly skilled Data Engineer to design, build, and maintain our data infrastructure, with a strong emphasis on data integration, architecture, and pipeline development. The ideal candidate will have expert-level SQL and Python skills and a deep understanding of data modeling, ETL processes, and system integrations.

This role requires a strong technical foundation, problem-solving skills, and the ability to work across teams to enable data-driven decision-making. You will play a crucial role in optimizing data flows and ensuring efficient data storage, access, and processing.

This is a full-time remote position, and the candidate should be comfortable working in either the Pacific Standard Time (PST) or Eastern Standard Time (EST) timezone

Key Responsibilities

Data Integration & Pipeline Development: Design and implement scalable ETL/ELT pipelines to integrate data from multiple sources into a centralized data platform.

Data Architecture: Develop and maintain robust data models, schemas, and warehouse structures to support analytics and business intelligence needs.

SQL & Database Management: Write and optimize complex SQL queries for data transformation, extraction, and performance tuning.

Python Development: Build and maintain automation scripts, data transformation processes, and API integrations using Python.

Scalability & Performance Optimization: Ensure data systems are optimized for performance, reliability, and scalability.

Collaboration: Work closely with data analysts, data scientists, and software engineers to support data needs across the organization.

Monitoring & Debugging: Implement logging, monitoring, and alerting solutions to ensure data integrity and pipeline health.





Qualifications & Experience

5+ years of experience in data engineering, software development, or a related field.

Expert proficiency in SQL, including performance tuning, query optimization, and database management.

Expert-level Python skills, including experience with data processing libraries (e.g., Pandas, PySpark, SQLAlchemy).

Strong experience with data integration across APIs, third-party services, and internal systems.





Deep understanding of data architecture principles, including data modeling, warehouse design, and distributed systems.

Experience working with cloud-based data platforms (e.g., AWS, GCP, Azure, Snowflake, BigQuery, Redshift).

Familiarity with workflow orchestration tools (e.g., Apache Airflow, Prefect, Dagster).

Experience with version control (Git), CI/CD pipelines, and containerization (Docker, Kubernetes) is a plus.

Hands on working with ELT/ETL tools along with API based ingestion using code.





Preferred Skills

Knowledge of streaming data technologies (e.g., Kafka, Kinesis, Pub/Sub).

Familiarity with data governance, security, and compliance best practices.



IMPORTANT: If you are interested and qualified, please submit a link to your resume AND your voice recording to 
 will only process applications of those who will send both. Applications sent through OLJ will be automatically discarded. DO NOT apply if you do not have the experience.

title: Quantity Surveyor – Commercial Flooring
description:
MeasureSquare M8 / CRM Experience Required



We are a fast-paced commercial flooring business seeking an experienced Quantity Surveyor to join our team.



This is a high-volume, detail-critical role. You must be able to work efficiently, accurately, and confidently under time pressure while maintaining commercial awareness.



You will be quoting directly from architectural drawings and specifications and must have a solid understanding of commercial floor and wall finishes — including installation methodology, floor preparation, and sequencing.



Key Responsibilities



Measure projects from architectural and construction drawings



Complete accurate take-offs using MeasureSquare M8 CAD



Prepare and issue structured quotations using MeasureSquare CRM



Review specifications and identify full flooring systems required



Allow correctly for floor preparation, moisture systems, trims, transitions, and wall finishes



Identify discrepancies, omissions, or risks within drawings and specifications



Communicate clearly with project managers and English-speaking clients when clarification is required



Work within deadlines in a fast-paced commercial environment



Essential Requirements



Proven experience as a Quantity Surveyor / Estimator (construction-based)



Strong experience reading architectural plans and specifications



Experience using take-off software (MeasureSquare M8 highly preferred)



Experience in commercial flooring or interior finishes



Strong knowledge of vinyl, carpet, laminate, wall linings, and floor preparation systems



Strong spoken and written English (client communication required)



Ability to work independently with minimal supervision



High attention to detail and structured working style



Important



This role requires:



Clear verbal communication with English-speaking clients



Strong comprehension skills



Accuracy under time pressure



Independent thinking and risk awareness



We are not looking for someone who simply counts square metres.



We are looking for someone who understands how flooring is installed, can anticipate issues from plans, and protects margin by identifying risks before they become problems on site.



To confirm you have read this description carefully, please include the words “M8 Flooring” at the top of your application.

title: URGENT | Senior Full Stack Developer
description:

Senior Full Stack Developer (Distributed Systems &

Computational Modeling)



Role Overview: We are looking for a Senior Full Stack Developer to join our core

engineering team building a proprietary platform for high-stakes industrial simulations and

capital project optimization. You will be responsible for developing the underlying

framework that manages complex, multi-stage computational pipelines. Your work will

focus on the seamless integration of heavy backend processing with a responsive, datarich

user experience, ensuring the reliable execution of sophisticated resource and design

optimizations.



Technical Requirements

numerical and scientific libraries for large-scale data manipulation and algorithmic

optimization.

• Asynchronous Architecture: Extensive experience with distributed task queues

(e.g., Celery) to manage long-running, interdependent background processes and

complex workflow signatures.

• Algorithmic Implementation: Strong background in applied mathematics,

including spatial geometry, graph theory, and network flow optimization.

• Data Lifecycle Management: Expertise in managing state across distributed

systems using high-performance caching layers and persistent databases.



2. API & Real-Time Infrastructure:

• Framework Mastery: Deep experience with Python-based web frameworks (e.g.,

Django) for building robust, secure, and scalable API architectures.

• Real-Time Data Streaming: Proficiency in implementing WebSockets or similar

protocols to provide live telemetry and status updates from background engines to

the end-user.

• System Integrity: Experience designing systems that maintain strict data

consistency across multi-step, automated computational workflows.



3. Frontend & Visualization:

• Data-Intensive UIs: Ability to build sophisticated interfaces for managing complex

input parameters and visualizing multi-variable simulation outputs.

• Spatial Visualization: Experience rendering and manipulating 3D geometric entities

(vertices, faces, and polylines) within the browser to provide visual validation of

backend calculations.





Key Responsibilities:

• Bridge the gap between high-level logical planning and low-level computational

execution.

• Optimize the performance of proprietary spatial and geometric algorithms.

• Build the infrastructure that allows users to audit and interact with complex,

automated engineering decisions in real-time.

• Maintain and scale a distributed environment where background tasks must operate

with high reliability and low latency.





Preferred Qualifications:

• Degree in Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, Physics, or a related

Engineering field.

• Proven track record of building "Human-in-the-loop" systems where users interact

with complex automated processes.

• Prior experience in fields such as industrial automation, logistics, CAD software

development, or advanced manufacturing simulations.

• Familiarity with mining/energy industries is a plus.

title: Virtual Acquisition Manager (Real Estate) – Follow Up Leads, Run Comps, Draft Contracts
description: We are a small real estate investing company (wholesaling) looking for a reliable, experienced Virtual Acquisition Manager to manage lead follow-up, talk to motivated sellers, run comps/ARV, calculate offer ranges, draft purchase agreements, and keep everything organized in our CRM. This is not a “dial all day” job only. Your priority is closing contracts from inbound + existing leads, then cold calling provided lists during downtime. What you will be working on (daily) Priority 1: Inbound & warm leads Follow up call center leads submitted into our CRM Follow up positive SMS replies (our campaigns + AI bot handle first response; you take over when a seller is interested) Answer calls/texts from our direct mail campaign during your working hours Call back missed calls and respond quickly during your shift Priority 2: Acquire deals Qualify sellers using MCTP (Motivation, Condition, Timeframe, Price) Ask the important questions (occupancy, decision maker, mortgage/liens/probate/tenants) Run comps to determine ARV and estimate repairs using our repair buckets Calculate MAO using our rules and propose an offer range Negotiate calmly and professionally (no pressure, no arguing) Draft contracts and prepare a complete deal file (James signs all contracts) Build a “deal packet” with notes, comps, photos (if available), and paperwork Priority 3: Downtime outreach Cold call lists we provide only when follow-up is caught up Log all activity and notes properly in the CRM Tools you will use GoHighLevel CRM (calls, texts, notes, pipelines) – you will have restricted access Discord (daily check-in/out, daily reporting, live lead handoff, training) Propwire (comps/ARV) + Zillow/Redfin for cross-checking Company VA Gmail account (for logins) Work schedule Full-time: 8 hours/day (Mon–Fri) Must be consistent and reliable We prefer someone who can overlap with US Eastern Time hours Pay $5–$8/hour depending on experience Bonuses: bonuses per signed/closed (negotiable based on experience) (Bonuses are paid only when CRM notes + the deal packet are complete and usable.) What we expect (non-negotiables) Excellent English communication (spoken and written) Strong follow-up discipline (no “lead leaks”) Clean CRM notes and organization (if it’s not in the CRM, it didn’t happen) Ability to run comps and explain ARV clearly (no inflated numbers) You must be comfortable drafting contracts carefully and accurately Professional, calm, and friendly tone with sellers Willing to sign an NDA Experience we prefer Real estate wholesaling acquisitions / ISA / lead manager experience Experience using a CRM (GoHighLevel is a plus) Experience with comps, ARV, basic repair estimation, and negotiating To apply (important) In your application, please include: A short paragraph about your real estate acquisitions experience Your internet speed + headset setup The tools you’ve used (CRMs, dialers, comp tools) A brief example of how you would respond to this seller message: “Your offer is too low. I’m not giving it away.” Your expected hourly rate ($5–$8) and confirmation you can work 8 hours/day

title: Email  Marketing Specialist
description:
We’re Hiring: Cold
 outreach Specialist



We’re not looking for someone who “knows how to send
s.”



We’re looking for someone who understands cold
 as a revenue engine.



If you’ve built real outbound systems, scaled inboxes, protected deliverability, and generated replies that convert — keep reading.



???? What You’ll Actually Be Responsible For



This is not a copy-paste VA role.



You will:



* Build cold
 systems from zero (domains, DNS, SPF, DKIM, DMARC, tracking, routing)

* Set up and scale multi-inbox infrastructure for mass outreach

* Warm and manage inboxes properly (not fake metrics — real deliverability)

* Launch and manage campaigns inside tools like Instantly, Smartlead, Lemlist, etc.

* Write or improve high-converting cold
 sequences

* A/B test angles, hooks, subject lines, and CTAs

* Monitor reply rates, bounce rates, domain health, and continuously optimize

* Protect sender reputation while scaling volume



If you’ve never built backend infrastructure yourself — this role isn’t for you.



???? What We’re Looking For



* Hands-on experience scaling cold
 campaigns

* Deep understanding of deliverability (SPF, DKIM, DMARC, inbox rotation, spam triggers)

* Strong copy instincts — short, clear, response-driven writing

* Analytical mindset — you track numbers, not vibes

* Ability to troubleshoot issues fast (Google Postmaster, blocklists, etc.)

* Ownership mentality — you don’t wait to be told what to fix



???? Who This Is NOT For



* People who only “manage campaigns” but never built infrastructure

* People who rely fully on warm-up tools without understanding why

* People who think 1% reply rate is acceptable

* Anyone who needs hand-holding



???? What Success Looks Like



* Stable inbox health

* Scalable sending systems

* High-quality reply rates

* Continuous optimization



If you’re confident you can build and scale outbound the right way — apply.

title: Entry-Level Healthcare Virtual Assistant (full/part-time)
description:
APPLICATION PROCESS:

1
 us your resume in PDF format only. Include all of the jobs you've worked at and the month + year. Do not leave anything off. Do not leave anything off.  You must provide an explanation of any gaps in your work history. Include the compensation you received for each job. Do not give us your hourly pay, only your annual compensation or total compensation.  If there is any gap in your resume without an explanation of the gap, you will be disqualified.



2.
 us a 60-second video of yourself answering the following question:

What are the 3 most important things that the company you work for MUST do to show you that they care about you? For example, if they don’t give me these 3 things then that means they don’t care about me. The video CANNOT EXCEED 60 seconds, or you will automatically be disqualified.



3. IMPORTANT: Please
 us at 
 to follow the above instructions will result in automatic disqualifications.  Do not DM us or call us or contact us in any other way.



ABOUT OUR COMPANY:

Achieve Integrative Health is the #1 rated Acupuncture & Wellness Clinic in the United States with over 750 five star google reviews. Our Mission is to help people restore their body’s God given ability to heal itself so that they can do what they love. Our vision is to equip and inspire one million people around the world to do what they love, when they want, with whom they want. 



WHY JOIN US?

• You’ll Achieve your Goals = our team provides all of the resources (information, training, opportunities) you’ll need to achieve all of your Professional, Financial and Personal Goals, as long as you are willing to put in the work and deliver results.



• Peace and Joy Team = we have a phenomenal culture of care for our patients and our tea
mbers. We are very strict with our rules, policies and core values in order to protect our culture of peace and joy.  Imagine being on a team where you don’t have to deal with people who talk behind your back and end up back stabbing you.



• Be Highly Rewarded as a Side Benefit = imagine being able to do your Passion everyday and make a phenomenal living as a side benefit. The average "experienced" VAs in the Philippines/Indonesia make $5-$7 USD/hr, our entry-level VAs start off making $5/hr. We have a quarterly bonus program, where some of our tea
mbers have earned $500-$1,000USD per quarter, and this year 2025, because the team has performed so well, some tea
mbers were paid an 'additional' year end bonus of $2000-$3000 USD.



BENEFITS

• Competitive Total Compensation = $5-$12 USD/hr for graveyard shift only.

• Unlimited Opportunities for Growth = as long as you can generate more results for the company we will never limit your ability to grow within our company. Every tea
mber can also become a partner of the business if they desire.

• Other Benefits for qualified tea
mbers = paid-time off, premiu
dical insurance, Employee Savings Matching Program

• Work from Home = no more 2-4 hour commutes to work

• Wellness Initiatives = benefit from complimentary virtual health services from our medical providers, ensuring your well-being and your family’s well-being is always a priority.



JOB RESPONSIBILITIES

• Receive all inbound calls to close Leads wanting to receive treatments at our clinic

• Call,
, and use various communication forms to identify the validity and potential of the lead

• Receive all inbound calls to answer questions – fact find and qualify lead/route to appropriate tea
mbers

• Work with patients to ensure they are satisfied with the services provided

• Encourage happy patients to send us their success stories

• Share patient success stories during daily company meeting

• Implement our CARE system to follow-up with our patients to provide 5 star service

• Check-in and checkout patients

• Verify Insurance Benefits

• Other additional tasks may be added based on your strengths…



CHARACTER REQUIREMENTS & QUALIFICATIONS

• You must truly have a caring heart and truly want to help people improve their health, if you are mainly focused on how much money you can make, we are not the team for you

• You must speak Fluent English (ie. someone on the phone can understand what you're saying w/o straining)

• You must be organized and be able to handle multiple tasks and responsibilities everyday. If you’re looking to only do one or two tasks per day, we are the wrong team for you.

• You must be able to follow instructions exactly as written, if you don’t like reading or following instructions, we are not the right team for you

• You must have a good heart. If you like to gossip behind peoples back, please don’t apply.

• You must value Results over effort. If you like to be paid based on how many tasks you completed or how much responsibilities you have, we are not the team for you. We pay ONLY based on you meeting your KPIs, metrics, quotas.

• You must sleep the same schedule 7 days a week, as this is a graveyard shift, you cannot switch back to the Philippines/Indonesian time zone on the weekends as this destroys your health. Your Health is our priority, and if you don’t value your own health we don’t want you on our team.

• You must be honest and have integrity. If you are caught lying, you will be immediately terminated.

• You must want to EARN your pay (ie. base salary + bonuses) instead of being given a pay (ie. focused only on base salary) that you didn’t earn.

* we are not looking for experience, we prefer candidates who have no medical VA experience, as having experience hinders your success on our team.  We are looking for character, who you are as a person.



WORKSTATION REQUIREMENTS

• You must have a separate quiet room to work in. You can not have your children or anybody else in the room that you work as your screen will be displaying confidential information, no exceptions.

• There can not be any background noise in your room when you are making phone calls.

• You will be required to provide photos of your workspace

• We will also randomly ask you to show your workspace via your webcam, and if you are caught lying you will be fired immediately.



COMPUTER AND INTERNET REQUIREMENTS:

• Fast and reliable wired internet connection of not less than 100 Mbps

• Secondary and Tertiary Back up Internet of not less than 10 Mbps

• At least one Power Station Backup

• Dual Monitor

• Intel Core i3 or higher Operating System with at least 8gb RAM

• Excellent quality headset with microphone, and a working webcam



WORK SCHEDULE:

OPTION 1 > Full-time 8:00 - 18:00 (M-Th) 8:00-16:00 (F) U.S. Central Standard Time, 2-hr lunch breaks 

OPTION 2 > Part-time 7:00-13:00 (M-F) U.S. Central Standard Time 

OPTION 3 > Part-time 13:00-18:30 (M-F) U.S. Central Standard Time

title: Ai video editor
description:
We are a fast-growing e-commerce company looking for a talented and disciplined video editor to produce high-performing ad videos. IMPORTANT: All work is done in Spanish (Spain and Mexico markets).

Main Mission

Your role will be to edit videos optimized for Meta Ads and TikTok Ads, following strict briefs and processes. Work by batches: 1 batch = same video with 3 different hooks. Minimum volume: 5 batches/week (15 videos).

Required Skills

    •    Proven experience in video editing for e-commerce, dropshipping, or Meta/TikTok ads.

    •    Proficiency in CapCut, Premiere Pro, or After Effects.

    •    Mastery of AI tools: HeyGen (avatars, lipsync, AI videos) and OpenArt (images, backgrounds).

    •    Knowledge of hooks (0-3s), scroll-stoppers, ad pacing, and conversion-focused structures.

    •    Up-to-date with current trends: fast cuts, text overlays, pattern interrupts, UGC formats.

Mandatory Tools

    •    HeyGen (avatars, lipsync, AI videos).

    •    OpenArt (images, backgrounds).

    •    Drive, Notion, Frame.io for collaboration.

Conditions

    •    Part-time: Minimum 5 batches/week.

    •    Rate: 29 USD per batch (1 batch = same video with 3 different hooks).

    •    Remote, long-term if performance is excellent.

    •    Internal communication in English (operational English required); production in Spanish.

Application Process (mandatory)

    1.    Send your portfolio with e-commerce/ads examples.

    2.    Confirm your volume (5 batches/week) and AI tools mastery.

    3.    Test: Mini-batch with 3 hooks from a provided script (deliver 3 videos).

Only profiles with e-commerce experience and successful test will be considered. No improvisation—focus on fast execution and feedback.

title: Social Media & Brand Manager
description:
Content & Brand Execution Lead

Remote – Full Time

We are building a high-performance sales organization.

This is not a lifestyle brand.

etings (60-90 min calls chopped into 30-60 sec clips)

title: Social Media Manager & Content Operations
description:
I'm a tech/AI creator with 142K on Instagram, 280K on TikTok, and 18K on YouTube. I create short-form content about AI, robotics, and emerging technology. My top videos have over 1M. 

I handle the creative direction, scripting, and filming myself. What I need is someone to take everything I create and make sure it reaches every platform, every day, looking polished and on-brand. You're the engine that keeps the machine running while I focus on creating.



What you'll do:

Post content daily across Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn, and YouTube on a consistent schedule

Repurpose short-form video scripts into Instagram carousels, LinkedIn posts, and Substack/newsletter articles

Design clean, scroll-stopping carousels in Canva that match my brand aesthetic

Adapt content for each platform — write tailored captions, adjust hooks for TikTok vs IG vs LinkedIn (not just cross-posting the same thing everywhere)

Respond to comments and DMs across all platforms in my voice — build real relationships, not generic replies

Flag brand deal inquiries and collaboration requests that come through DMs

Manage and maintain the content calendar so nothing gets missed

Track performance metrics weekly — what's working, what's not, what to double down on

Stay current on platform algorithm changes, trending formats, and new features

Help grow a loyal, engaged community — not just followers, but people who actually care



You must be:

Experienced managing social media for a creator, brand, or business (show me the accounts)

Skilled in Canva — you can take a script or concept and turn it into a beautiful carousel without much direction

A strong writer who can adapt tone across platforms — casual and punchy for TikTok, professional but human for LinkedIn, engaging for Instagram

Someone who understands community building, not just posting — you know the difference between growing followers and growing fans

Familiar with scheduling tools (Later, Buffer, or similar)

Organized and consistent — if a post is supposed to go out Tuesday at 9am, it goes out Tuesday at 9am

Proactive — you spot opportunities and flag them, you don't wait to be told



Nice to have:

Experience in the tech/AI space or interest in learning it

Experience writing newsletters or Substack articles

Understanding of LinkedIn content strategy specifically

You've grown a social media account before (yours or someone else's)



Start: Immediate with 1-week paid trial

Growth potential: This role grows as the brand grows. We're scaling from 2-3 posts per week to daily content across 4+ platforms. More brand deals, more content, more platforms = more hours and higher pay for you. I want someone who's in this for the long run.



TO APPLY — You MUST complete all 3 steps. Applications that skip any step will not be considered.

1. Show me your work. Share social media accounts you've managed, carousels you've designed, or content you've repurposed across platforms. If you've grown an account, tell me where it started and where it is now.

2. The Repurpose Test. Here's a concept: "Most people think AI uses more energy than it actually does — one ChatGPT prompt uses less energy than boiling a kettle." Show me how you'd turn this into (a) an Instagram caption, (b) a LinkedIn post, and (c) describe what a 5-slide carousel would look like for this topic.

3. The Community Question. You're managing an account with 142K followers but engagement has been inconsistent. What are 3 specific things you'd do in your first two weeks to start building a more engaged, loyal community? Don't give me generic advice — be specific.

title: Short-Form Video Editor (After Effects) — AI, Instagram/TikTok
description:
JOB TITLE: Short-Form Video Editor (After Effects) — AI, Instagram/TikTok

SALARY: $1,100 USD/month

TYPE: Full-time (40 hours/week)

LOCATION: Remote (Philippines)

SCHEDULE: Async, with Vancouver overlap (PST) for feedback



---



THE MISSION



Prismiera is a luxury jewelry brand with a short-form video series already producing cinematic content on YouTube — mythology, history, goddess archetypes, and Dark Academia aesthetics.



We need someone to own the Instagram and TikTok side.



This is NOT repurposing YouTube content into different aspect ratios. This is building platform-native content that makes a woman feel powerful in under 20 seconds. You'll create original short-form edits and cinematic skits using AI-generated footage, voiceovers, and atmospheric visuals — designed from the ground up for how Instagram and TikTok audiences actually consume.



The other half of this role: you'll be working with our AI-generated personas who serve as the visual anchor across our short-form content. You'll generate, composite, integrate, and stylize AI character visuals into edits that feel striking and intentional, not gimmicky. If the idea of building a visual identity around an AI persona excites you, keep reading!



---



THE STYLE



The content mix you'll produce:



65% VIBE & SCENARIO — The kind of reel a woman sends to her group chat with no caption because the vibe speaks for itself.



25% CINEMATIC SKITS — High-end, visually stunning executions of viral formats and dark humor. The premise can be slightly unhinged or ironic, but the visuals never break luxury. Think high-end perfume commercial meets TikTok audio trend. The Goddess is never the butt of the joke — she's the punchline, and she always wins.



10% SENSORY / EXPERIMENTAL — Layered, fast, loop-optimized. Visual overload with mythological texture. The algorithmic wildcard.



YES: Aspirational. Lethal elegance. Fashion-edit energy. Dark femininity. Music-driven impact. Content that feels like a luxury car reel meets ancient mythology. Cinematic skits using our AI personas — high-production value, deadpan, surreal, or darkly ironic.



NO: CapCut presets. Generic motivational quote reels. Low-effort vlog-style acting. Slapstick comedy. Anything that looks like it was made in Canva. Anything that cheapens a demi-luxury product.



---



WHAT YOU'LL DO



Create & Adapt: Produce original Instagram/TikTok-native content using AI-generated visuals, trending audio, and our brand's mythology. Some pieces you'll build from scratch. Others you'll adapt from assets in our YouTube production pipeline. Either way, you're not resizing — you're crafting content shaped for how each platform rewards engagement.



Cinematic Skits: Build short-form skits around our AI personas that use trending formats, dark humor, or deadpan irony — executed at a visual level that never drops below luxury. People share it for the joke, follow the page for the aesthetic.



AI Persona Integration: Composite and stylize our AI-generated characters into edits as a visual anchor. She's not a narrator in your content — she's the presence. The face the eye locks onto while mythology and music layers move around her.



AI Content Generation: You won't just receive AI assets — you'll create them. Using tools like Seedance 2.0 and Seedream, you'll generate goddess visuals, atmospheric environments, and character footage that feed directly into your edits. You're both the director and the editor.



Music-Sync Editing: Your cuts, transitions, and visual reveals are married to the beat. You understand rhythm as a storytelling tool. Swells, drops, silence, impact — all intentional.



Platform Instinct: You understand what Instagram rewards vs. what TikTok rewards. You know what gets saved on IG. You know what gets looped on TikTok. You design for those behaviors, not just for visual quality.



Instagram Packaging: Beyond the Reel itself — you contribute to grid cohesion, caption strategy, and Story sequencing. The profile should make someone think "I want to be part of this" within 2 seconds of landing.



Volume at Speed: Once your templates and aesthetic are locked, your turnaround per piece should be significantly faster than building from zero. We expect high output.



---



CORE REQUIREMENTS



After Effects (Mandatory). Compositing, layering, motion graphics, light/shadow matching. This is your primary tool. You build visual experiences, not just cuts.



Premiere Pro. For project handoffs and consistency with the rest of the team.



AI Generation Fluency. This is not optional. You'll be using frontier AI tools daily — not just editing AI output, but generating it. You'll learn to prompt, iterate, select, and refine AI-generated visuals as a core part of your production workflow. We provide paid accounts for all tools (Seedance 2.0, Seedream, and whatever launches next). What we need is someone who treats these tools as creative instruments, not novelties.



The Aesthetic Eye. You instinctively know the difference between aspirational and try-hard. Between elegant and overproduced. Between powerful and loud. Your edits make people feel something before they consciously understand what they're looking at.



Music & Rhythm. You've made edits where the music drives the visuals — AMVs, fashion reels, phonk edits, fan edits, whatever. You understand pacing as a weapon. You know what "the drop" means and you know when NOT to use it.



Loop Thinking. You design edits that reward rewatching. The cut that lands on beat, the detail you only catch the second time, the seamless loop point. You think in circles, not lines.



Strong English. Daily async communication — clear, direct, professional.



Reliable & Coachable. You hit deadlines or warn early. You take direct feedback and iterate fast. You flag problems with options, not excuses.



---



BONUS SKILLS (Not Required, But We'll Notice)



- Color grading — pushing AI output and mixed footage into a consistent luxury palette

- Typography sense — text overlays that feel intentional and premium

- Sound design — SFX layering beyond just music (risers, hits, atmospheric texture)

- Carousel / static design for Instagram companion posts

- Understanding of Instagram analytics — saves, shares, completion rates, and what drives them

- Experience building visual identities for brands or personas on social media



---



WEEKLY OUTPUT



Ramp-up (first 2–3 weeks): 3–5 pieces as you learn the brand aesthetic, lock your AE templates, learn the AI generation tools, and calibrate with the team.



Steady state: 10–15 pieces per week across Instagram and TikTok — a mix of original productions and asset-based adaptations depending on the content calendar.



---



HOW THIS ROLE FITS



Other editors handle cinematic YouTube production and visual effects — you own social media. Same mythology, same brand, different platform behavior. Each editor has a distinct lane, and yours is how Prismiera looks and feels on Instagram and TikTok.



---



SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS



RAM: 16GB minimum (32GB preferred) + SSD

Reliable high-speed internet (upload speed matters)

Must run After Effects, Premiere Pro, and browser-based AI tools simultaneously



---



PAID TRIAL (Shortlisted Candidates)



Before any full-time commitment, we run a weekly paid trial. We provide real assets from our production pipeline, style references, and the AI persona visuals. You deliver content. Trial is compensated at $250 USD at the end of each week. If it's a mutual fit after 30 days, we transition to regular bi-weekly payments (before work).



This protects both sides — you see whether the work fits your strengths, we see whether the output fits our brand.



---



WHAT WE OFFER



- Paid accounts for all frontier AI tools — Seedance 2.0, Seedream, and whatever launches next

- Creative ownership — you're defining how a luxury brand looks and feels on Instagram and TikTok from day one

- An AI persona to build around — not a hypothetical, an active visual identity you'll shape and evolve

- A role that evolves as the tools evolve — this job will look different in six months, and that's the point

- Clear briefs — asset libraries, mood references, and specific direction for every batch

- Direct feedback — specific, constructive notes on every edit

- A brand worth building — Prismiera launches soon. A second AI-native brand is incubating behind it. You're not joining a finished machine. You're helping build one.



---



COMPENSATION



$1,100 USD/month. Paid trial at $250 USD/week, transitioning to bi-weekly payments of $550 (before work) after 30 days.



---



OWNERSHIP & CONFIDENTIALITY



All outputs (edits, project files, prompts, generated assets, persona visuals) are Prismiera property and must remain confidential.



---



HOW TO APPLY



Do not send a generic cover letter.

Use 7 apply points or more when applying.



Subject line: PRISMIERA SOCIAL — [Your Name]



Send the following (in this order):



1. The Vibe Test. Link to ONE edit you've made that is aspirational, aesthetic, or fashion-adjacent — or a skit that demonstrates platform-native virality instinct. Format doesn't matter. The feeling does.



2. The Rhythm Test. Link to ONE edit where the music drives the visuals. Show us your beat-sync instinct. (Can overlap with #1 if one video demonstrates both.)



3. The Creative Instinct Test (3–5 sentences total). You're given a 45-second cinematic video about a queen who poisoned her entire court, a folder of our AI Goddess visuals, and a dark atmospheric beat. Pitch two reworks: (A) a 15-second Instagram Reel designed to get saved — tell us your audio choice, pacing, and what the first 2 seconds look like; and (B) a 15-second cinematic skit that uses dark or deadpan humor without losing the luxury feel.



4. AI Experience (1–2 sentences). What is your experience level with generative AI tools? If none, say so — we'll evaluate the rest on its own merits.



5. Hardware. Your PC specs: CPU / GPU / RAM. Plus your internet upload speed.



6. Turnaround Estimate. Given existing footage, a music track, and an established AE template — how long would a 15–20 second piece take you?



7. The Rewrite. Rewrite this sentence to sound dark, powerful, and aspirational: "She is really cool and strong and she wins."

title: Virtual medical administrative assistant
description:
Virtual Medical Administrative Assistant – Pain Management/Neurology (USA)



Job Type:



Full-Time

Remote (Supporting U.S.-Based NeurologyPain Management Practice)



Position Overview:



We are seeking a highly organized and detail-oriented Virtual Medical Administrative Assistant to support a busy U.S.-based Neurology/Pain Management practice. The ideal candidate has prior experience in U.S. healthcare administration, understands medical terminology, and is comfortable working with insurance verification, prior authorizations, chart preparation, and patient scheduling.



This role requires excellent communication skills in english, HIPAA compliance awareness, and the ability to manage multiple tasks efficiently in a fast-paced medical environment.



Key Responsibilities:



Administrative Support

 • Manage patient scheduling and appointment confirmations

 • Handle inbound and outbound patient calls professionally

 • Maintain accurate patient records in the EMR/EHR system

 • Coordinate referrals and follow-ups



Insurance & Billing Support

 • Verify patient insurance eligibility and benefits

 • Obtain prior authorizations for procedures and medications and imaging

 • Submit and track referrals and authorizations and results 

 • Assist with claims follow-up and basic billing inquiries



Pain Management-Specific Tasks

 • Coordinate procedure scheduling (e.g., injections, nerve blocks)

 • Confirm imaging and diagnostic reports are received

 • Manage medication refill requests in accordance with provider guidelines

 • Track compliance documents (pain contracts, consent forms)



Documentation & Compliance

 • Ensure HIPAA-compliant handling of patient data

 • Upload and organize medical documents

 • Maintain accurate and up-to-date patient files



Qualifications:

 • Minimum 1–2 years experience in U.S. healthcare os required 

 • Experience in Pain Management, Neurology Orthopedics, or Specialty Clinics is a plus

 • Familiarity with EMR/EHR systems (eClinicalWorks is essential)

 • Knowledge of CPT, ICD-10 codes (basic understanding preferred)

 • Strong English communication skills (verbal and written)

 • High attention to detail and strong organizational skills

 • Ability to work during U.S. business hours



Technical Requirements:

 • Reliable high-speed internet connection

 • Noise-canceling headset

 • Quiet home office setup

 • Secure computer with updated antivirus software



Key Competencies:

 • Professional phone etiquette

 • Multitasking and time management

 • Problem-solving skills

 • Confidentiality and integrity

 Required:
