title: AI Video Prompt Generator (Sora, VEO 3, Kling AI, Luma) – YouTube Shorts Automation
description:
We are looking for an experienced AI Video Prompt Generator to create realistic, real-life style YouTube Shorts using advanced AI video generation tools such as Sora, VEO 3, Kling AI, Luma, and similar platforms.



Your primary responsibility will be writing precise prompts and generating high-quality, emotionally engaging videos focused on:



Human kindness



Animal rescue



Emotional real-life situations



Viral YouTube Shorts content



You will be provided with reference YouTube videos, and your role will be to generate similar videos using AI tools and prompt engineering, matching the realism, style, camera behavior, and emotional impact.



This is a long-term remote opportunity.



Responsibilities:



Write advanced prompts for AI video generation tools such as:



Sora



VEO 3



Kling AI



Luma



and similar AI video platforms



Generate realistic, phone-camera style YouTube Shorts videos



Study reference YouTube videos and recreate similar video style using AI prompts, including:



Camera angles and handheld realism



Lighting and environment



Emotional expression



Scene composition



Overall realism and storytelling



Refine prompts until the output closely matches the reference video quality



Deliver videos quickly and consistently



Follow provided prompt frameworks and instructions



Requirements (Apply Only If You Have Real Experience):



Proven experience using Sora, VEO 3, Kling AI, Luma, or similar AI video generation tools



Strong prompt engineering skills for realistic video generation



Ability to recreate videos similar to reference YouTube videos



Strong understanding of realism, camera movement, and scene control



Experience creating YouTube Shorts or vertical video content is preferred



Reliable communication and consistent delivery



Candidates with experience creating human kindness, animal rescue, emotional storytelling, or viral Shorts content will be prioritized.



Work Type:



Remote position



Long-term opportunity



Full-time or part-time



To Apply, Please Answer the Following:



Which AI video generation tools have you used? (Sora, VEO 3, Kling AI, Luma, etc.)



How long have you used these tools?



Share examples of videos you generated (links required)

Have you recreated videos based on YouTube references before? If yes, share examples



How many videos can you generate per day?



What is your computer specification?



What is your internet speed?



How soon can you start?



Important:



You will be provided with YouTube reference videos. You must be able to generate similar videos using AI tools and prompt engineering. Please apply only if you have real, hands-on experience with these tools.

title: Urgent- an individual talented in low content creation
description:
Are you a highly motivated and skilled individual looking for flexible, part-time opportunity to help drive the growth of my exciting e-commerce venture? I am looking to hire a couple of individuals to complete my small team of virtual assistants to help scale various business initiatives. If you are enthusiastic, detail oriented, and ready to make a significant impact, I would love to hear from you.



Position details:

Role: Virtual assistant

Hours: 10 hours per week (initially)

Schedule: Highly flexible 

Compensation: Competitive hourly rate + potential for quarterly bonuses based on work output and performance

Location: Fully remote



What you will bring to the team

I am looking for individuals who embody the core attributes:

- Exceptional communication: Excellent written and verbal communication skills are a must

- Customer service focus: A natural ability to maintain a high level of customer satisfaction and professionalism

- Time management: Exceptional ability to prioritise tasks, meet deadlines, and manage your time effectively

- Work ethic: Ability to work independently with minimal supervision whilst also being collaborative and effective team player

- Enthusiasm: A proactive, energetic, and 'can do' attitude 

- Creative - originality and creative concepts to differentiate the products from others



Required technical proficiencies in 3 or more of the below:

- Low content creation (i.e journals, planners, etc)

- Kids activity book creation

- Puzzles book creation (preferable)

- Colouring book creation (preferable) 

- Story book creation (preferable)

- book covers

 - social media content creation

Preferably use of other tools in addition to Canva to demonstrate efficiency in creation of these products. Highlight this in your application. Also preferrable to have access to ChatGPT plus or Kittl or bookbolt.



How to Apply

If this sounds like the perfect fit for your skills and passion, please submit your expression of interest to be considered for the next part of the recruitment stage. 



Your application must include the following two items:

1. Demonstration of skills: Provide examples (a portfolio) of your low content creation and tell me what products and processes you used to create these.

2. Tell me what your main goal is in the next 5 years.



I appreciate your interest and look forward to hearing from you. I will be in touch with candidates who successfully move forward in the next stage of the recruitment process. You will not receive a response unless you clearly address the application requirements.

title: Part-Time UGC Video Editor (META Ads)
description:
We’re an emerging healthy food brand scaling quickly in e-commerce and paid media, and we’re looking for a highly reliable, detail-oriented UGC Video Editor with experience creating high-converting META ads.



This role will primarily focus on UGC-style performance ads, though some projects may include mixed creative styles (storytelling, educational, and light brand-forward edits).



You’ll work closely with our Creative Strategist and Senior Video Editor to produce engaging, performance-driven ads at scale. This is ideal for someone who understands direct response marketing and can move quickly without sacrificing quality.



We move quite fast paced, but we do not cut corners.



This role starts part-time. Hours may vary initially but can grow over time, with the opportunity to become full-time for the right person.



Compensation is based on experience.



What You’ll Do:

Edit high-performing video ads for META 
 & Instagram)



Focus primarily on:

UGC-style ads

Direct response and hook-driven creatives



Occasionally edit:

Storytelling & educational content



Lifestyle & brand-forward creatives



Light animation (bonus)



Produce approximately listed goal of videos per week (depending on hours/workload)



Most ads are 30–90 seconds (under 2 minutes)



Follow creative briefs and scripts precisely



Ensure every visual aligns with the script and message (no mismatched scenes)



Collaborate weekly with the creative team to review performance and iterate



Maintain strong pacing, hooks, and clarity throughout each edit



Deliver work that requires minimal revisions



Quality Standards (Extremely Important)



We care deeply about attention to detail. Before submitting work, you are expected to double- or triple-check everything.



This includes:



Correct spelling and captions (no typos from the script)



Clean cuts and transitions



Proper pacing and scroll-stopping hooks



Background music properly leveled or muted when needed



Correct clip selection that matches the script’s message



Proper video length (no extra black frames or export errors)



Simple, easily catchable mistakes should not make it to review.



While occasional mistakes happen, repeated careless errors are not acceptable.



Speed matters, but rushing at the expense of quality is not okay.



Work Style & Expectations



Part-time role to start (hours may vary week to week)



Opportunity to grow into full-time



Must overlap with U.S. work hours (EST) for communication 

For example:

M - F 3AM-11AM, so there is an overlap between us for communication.



Must be able to follow direction carefully and execute feedback fully



Must complete all requested revisions in one pass (not partial fixes)



Must be organized and comfortable working in a structured workflow



You will be overseen by a Senior Video Editor and Creative Strategist. Performance and attention to detail are closely reviewed.



Tools & Experience

Required



Strong experience editing high-converting META ads



Proven UGC editing experience (hooks, captions, pacing, retention-driven cuts)



Proficiency in:



Premiere Pro, After Effects, CapCut Pro, InShot, and/or Canva



Strong understanding of direct response creative



Organized, reliable, and detail-oriented



Experience in fast-paced agency or performance-driven environments



Bonus (Not Required):



Experience with VEO, AI tools, or animation



Familiarity with
 Ads Manager, Motion, Atria 



Slack for daily communication



ClickUp for task management



We provide tools such as Storyblocks



You’ll collaborate with:



Founder



Performance team



Creative Strategist



Senior Video Editor



What We’re Looking For:



Strong work ethic



High attention to detail



Performance marketing mindset



Agency-level speed + precision



Adaptable and coachable



Takes pride in delivering clean, thoughtful work



Someone who genuinely cares about quality and consistency



How to Apply



Please reply with:



Your portfolio (UGC and performance ads preferred)



Prior experience working with agencies and/or brands



Any experience with performance-driven or paid social content



Your availability (weekly hours)



Your expected hourly rate



We’re excited to add someone who values quality, accountability, and craft as much as we do.



Thank you! We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Social Media Specialist
description:
Salon Marketing Solutions is an Australian-based marketing education company supporting beauty salons, skin clinics, and aesthetic businesses across Australia and New Zealand. We provide done-for-you campaigns, strategic mentoring, and practical tools to help clinic owners grow consistently and confidently.



Please ONLY apply if you have experience in the ff:
 Marketing, Meta Ads, Canva Pro, Meta Business Suite 



Recruited and Trained by Vanessa McDonald Consulting – Installed™ Service

Installed™ builds in-house marketing capability for beauty and skin clinics.

This role is a 4–6 week training and placement pathway, preparing you to run the full social media marketing function inside a clinic — not as an agency, but as an embedded tea
mber.



Purpose: 



To lead and execute a clinic’s social media marketing strategy, design, content, engagement, and paid ads — with the goal of growing visibility, followers, and lead lists. You will be placed with a growing clinic business (to be advised at the second interview) and work directly with the clinic owner following installation.

 marketing will be required on an ad-hoc basis to complement social strategy.

This is an incredible opportunity to learn directly from Vanessa McDonald — one of Australia’s most respected marketing strategists in the professional beauty and skincare industry, with 24 years of experience guiding clinics to build sustainable, high-performing marketing systems.



You’ll be trained in:



The beauty, skin, and aesthetics industry — treatments, terminology, and client psychology.

The specific clinic’s business, brand, and product range.

 marketing systems used within the industry, including Phorest or Shortcuts (training provided for these only if the clinic you are placed with uses these particular platforms).



Core Responsibilities: 



- Develop and implement Instagram and
 strategies that drive engagement, growth, and qualified new client leads.

- Manage Meta Ads end-to-end: strategy, creative, setup, optimisation, and reporting.

- Confidently operate within the Meta Business Suite and Ads Manager, keeping up to date with current Meta tools and best practices.

- Design high-quality, on-brand content in Canva Pro, following the clinic’s brand style guide.

- Create and edit reels and short-form videos using apps such as CapCut or similar.

- Write fluent, polished UK English captions and campaign copy that reflect the clinic’s tone of voice.

- Manage DMs and engagement daily — responding to enquiries, nurturing prospective clients, and connecting with local influencers and aligned businesses for collaboration opportunities.

- Build and send
 campaigns using Mailchimp or the clinic’s in-house marketing system (Mailchimp expertise is essential).

- Utilise AI tools to enhance efficiency while preserving human judgment and creative quality.

- Prepare concise monthly reports covering organic performance, ads, and
 activity.

- Once Installed, you’ll work directly with the clinic owner using a clear communication and project management system that sets expectations, deadlines, and approvals.



Required Experience & Skills



- Minimum 3 years’ proven experience in social media strategy and Meta Ads management.

- Demonstrated results in organic audience growth and engagement.

- Strong proficiency with Meta Business Suite, Ads Manager, data analysis, and reporting.

- Advanced Canva Pro design capability with excellent attention to detail. We’re seeking candidates who can create clean, professional artwork and design aligned to brand standards.

- Confident in photo editing and basic retouching to ensure all visual content is polished, consistent, and on-brand.

- Skilled in reel creation and short-form video editing (CapCut preferred).

- Expert in Mailchimp, including automation, segmentation, and reporting.

- Adaptable to other industry platforms such as Phorest or Shortcuts (training provided for these systems only).

- Familiar with ManyChat or similar tools for automated lead capture.

- Excellent written and spoken UK English for an Australian audience (10/10 fluency).

- Reliable, responsive, and professional in remote settings.

- Must successfully complete a test task before onboarding.



Work Structure & Conditions

Part-time: 20 hours per week (remote, flexible)

Training rate: $175 AUD/week (4–6 weeks)

Probation (3 months): $200 AUD/week

Post-probation: $220 AUD/week

After 12 months: $250 AUD/week

Performance bonuses apply for meeting or exceeding campaign KPIs and results benchmarks.

If you prefer full-time work, you may be placed with two clinics instead of one.

All recruitment, training, and placement are managed through Vanessa McDonald Consulting – Installed™.



To maintain quality and focus:

You cannot work with other beauty or skin clinics in Australia or New Zealand.

You may retain a small number of freelance clients outside this industry, provided your total weekly workload remains under 50 hours.

You’ll have full ownership of strategy ? design ? captions ? scheduling ? reporting, supported by structured systems, brand training, and direct client collaboration.



Hiring Process



Application review: We assess your cover letter, résumé, and portfolio for relevance and quality.

Initial interview: A video interview with our recruitment specialist to discuss experience, fit, and expectations.

Test task: You’ll complete a short assignment to demonstrate your ability in design, content creation, and social strategy.

Final interview: Successful applicants are invited to a second interview with Vanessa McDonald.

Presentation matters — please ensure a professional appearance, a stable internet and audio connection, and a tidy background during interviews.



Fill out this form to apply:

title: Remote Financial & Expense Tracking Specialist (Business + Personal)
description:
I’m looking for a reliable and detail-oriented Financial & Expense Tracking Specialist to manage and analyze my monthly financial activity.



This is a long-term role. Each month, I will provide bank statements (business + personal), and your responsibility will be to:



Organize transactions



Categorize spending



Track trends



Identify overspending



Provide clear financial insights



Suggest improvements



The goal is simple:

?? Help me clearly understand where my money goes every month.

?? Identify unnecessary expenses.

?? Improve financial efficiency.



Every Month You Will:



• Review business and personal bank statements

• Categorize all transactions (accurately and consistently)

• Update a master financial tracking system (Google Sheets or software)

• Create visual dashboards (graphs, KPIs, spending breakdowns)

• Identify overspending patterns

• Highlight unusual expenses

• Provide a short monthly financial summary report



Additionally:



• Recommend the best accounting software if needed (QuickBooks, Xero, etc.)

• Improve and optimize the tracking system over time

• Maintain strict confidentiality



What I’m Looking For



? Experience in bookkeeping or accounting

? Strong Google Sheets skills (advanced formulas, pivot tables, dashboards)

? Ability to create clean, simple financial dashboards

? Strong attention to detail

? Fluent written English

? Experience working with entrepreneurs / online businesses preferred

? Experience with multiple currencies is a plus



Deliverables Example



Each month I expect:



• Updated financial spreadsheet

• Spending breakdown by category

• Business vs Personal comparison

• Monthly summary (short analysis)

• Clear visual dashboard

• Recommendations (if overspending is detected)



Compensation



???? $200–$250 per month

???? Long-term position

???? Opportunity to grow as business expands



To Apply



Please include:



Your experience in bookkeeping/accounting



Example of a financial dashboard or sheet you created



What accounting software you recommend and why



Your availability



Important



This role requires:

• High confidentiality

• Precision

• Consistency

• Clear communication



I am looking for someone reliable long-term.

title: JOB TITLE Real Estate Marketing & Database VA — Australian Agency
description:
Above Property Group is a professional Australian real estate agency based in Canberra. We manage over 300 rental properties and are running a 2-year sales campaign for MAVEN, a luxury apartment development in the heart of Canberra's CBD. We are a small, close-knit team — one of our tea
mbers speaks Tagalog, so you will feel welcome from day one.

We are looking for a part-time Marketing and Database VA to help us grow. This is a long-term role with at least two years of committed work available. If you perform well, full-time hours will follow quickly.

You do not need to know everything on day one. If your English comprehension is strong and you are a fast learner, we will train you on our systems and workflows.

WHAT YOU WILL BE DOING



Cleaning, organising, and maintaining our client and prospect databases

Managing and following up incoming leads for the MAVEN luxury apartment project

Sending bulk
s and building professional
 templates in Mailchimp

Re-engaging our existing database through outbound calls and
 campaigns

title: Cold Calling Sales Closer
description:
We are growing our dog accessories division by bringing handcrafted Maasai leather beaded collars to pet lovers and retailers around the world. These collars are made by skilled Maasai artisans in Kenya, combining cultural heritage, premium leather and durable, water-resistant construction. The result is a unique, story-driven product that helps stores stand out and delight their customers.



As a Cold Calling Sales Closer, you own the entire sales cycle on the phone: from first contact with qualified leads to closing initial orders and repeat purchases. You will speak directly with pet retailers, groomers, boarding facilities and importers, present our product, handle objections and secure sales. Your income grows with your results through a monthly salary plus a commission-based structure.



What you will do

- Filter & Call qualified leads from our database and introduce our products.

- Identify quickly if the prospect is a retailer, groomer, boarding facility, vet clinic or importer, and adapt your pitch.

- Present the product clearly: benefits, premium look and in-store positioning.

- Ask targeted questions to understand their business.

- Handle objections and turn them into opportunities.

- Close sales directly on the call.

- Follow up with warm prospects and turn interest into paid orders.

- Keep accurate notes in the CRM so nothing falls through the cracks.

- Share patterns and feedback with the team to improve scripts, offers and targeting.



We’re not looking for someone who

- Only books meetings and avoids asking for the order.

- Is uncomfortable discussing price or negotiating on the phone.

- Needs a large fixed salary and dislikes performance-based pay.

- Reads scripts word-for-word without listening or adapting.

- Avoids high outbound activity or takes rejection personally.



What’s in it for you

High earning potential through a commission-based model with uncapped upside.

A differentiated, easy-to-love product with a real story behind it.

Direct, visible impact on company growth with clear revenue attribution.

Remote-friendly setup and flexibility to organize your calling blocks.

Growth opportunities into Senior Closer, Key Account or Sales Team Lead.

Preferred experience



Must have

1–3+ years of experience in phone-based sales (telesales, outbound closing, SDR/BDR with closing responsibilities, etc.).

Proven track record of selling directly on calls, not just setting appointments.

Strong bias for action and comfort with daily activity and revenue targets.

Excellent spoken English and a clear, confident phone presence.

Strong listening and objection-handling skills; you are comfortable asking for the sale.

Comfortable with a fixed salary plus commission-based or commission-heavy pay structures.

Solid discipline in using CRM tools and following up.

Good, stable internet connection suitable for VoIP calls and remote work.

Resilience, persistence and a genuine growth mindset.



Nice to have

Experience selling to small businesses in the pet industry (retailers, groomers, vet clinics, distributors).

Experience in international sales or working across time zones.

High tech literacy with sales tools and AI assistants.

Background in sales, customer service or operations where you owned a target.



Recruitment process

Application with short Job requirements testing

Sales interview focused on your past closing experience and results.

Live cold-call simulation with feedback.

Final interview to align on commission structure, targets and ramp-up.

Reference check.

Offer.



We value real skills and real outcomes. If you are not willing to do a short live role-play or share a sample call (even anonymized), this is probably not the right role for you.

title: Senior QuickBooks Bookkeeper / Financial Controller (Construction Industry Preferred)
description:
< READ>

???? Job Overview

JAC Dreamscapes is a growing outdoor living design-build company based in the East Bay, California.

We are looking for a highly experienced QuickBooks expert who can take full ownership of our bookkeeping and financial organization.

This is NOT a data-entry role.

We need someone who:

Has years of real bookkeeping/accounting experience

Understands construction job costing

Can build clean financial systems from scratch

Can take initiative and lead

Can teach and guide the owner on financial clarity

We currently do not have structured bookkeeping in place. You will help build it properly.

???? Responsibilities

You will:

• Set up and organize QuickBooks Online properly

• Clean up and structure chart of accounts

• Categorize and reconcile past transactions

• Create job costing structure for construction projects

• Track revenue, cost of goods, materials, labor, and overhead

• Reconcile bank accounts and credit cards monthly

• Create monthly Profit & Loss reports

• Create cash flow tracking system

• Build financial dashboards in Google Sheets

• Track project profitability per job

• Create budget forecasting spreadsheets

• Monitor accounts payable and receivable

• Ensure sales tax tracking accuracy

• Prepare reports for CPA when needed

• Educate the owner on financial health metrics

You must be able to take initiative and recommend improvements.

???? Required Experience

• 3+ years QuickBooks Online experience (Required)

• Strong understanding of bookkeeping & accounting principles

• Construction / job costing experience strongly preferred

• Experience building financial systems from scratch

• Advanced Google Sheets skills (formulas, dashboards, tracking)

• Strong reconciliation experience

• Ability to explain financial reports clearly

???? We Are NOT Looking For

• Beginner bookkeepers

• Data entry clerks

• Someone who needs to be micromanaged

• Someone who just categorizes transactions

We need leadership in this role.

???? Ideal Candidate

You are:

• Detail-oriented

• Organized

• Confident in your accounting knowledge

• Comfortable correcting mistakes

• Comfortable taking control of financial systems

• Proactive in identifying problems

• Able to build clean, simple reporting systems

Bonus if you:

• Have worked with US-based construction companies

• Understand job costing deeply

• Have worked with companies doing $500K–$5M annually

???? Work Setup

• Part-time to start (10–20 hours/week)

• Long-term opportunity

• Must overlap with PST time zone at least 2–3 hours daily

• Must communicate clearly in English

???? How to Apply

Please include:

Your years of QuickBooks experience

Your experience with construction/job costing

A description of a bookkeeping system you built or cleaned up

What financial reports you believe are most important for a construction company

The word “Dreamscapes” at the top of your application

???? Final Note

We are building this company into a multi-million dollar operation.

We need financial clarity and structure.

If you are confident in your ability to take ownership of accounting systems and bring order to financial chaos — we want to hear from you.

title: Full-Stack Developer – MVP for Gamified Medical Training Platform
description:
## Overview



I am building the Phase 1 MVP of a gamified medical training platform.



The goal of this phase is to build a solid, scalable foundation — not a feature-heavy product.



The platform combines:



* Interactive case-based decision scenarios

* User progression system

* Performance metrics

* Memory reinforcement mechanics



Full product specifications will be shared after NDA.



---



## Phase 1 Scope (MVP Only)



The MVP will include:



 1?? User System



* Authentication (signup/login)

* Persistent user profile

* Basic progression tier (Level 1 ? Level 2)



2?? Scenario Engine



30–50 structured, multi-step interactive cases

2–3 decision steps per case

Outcome logic per decision

Case scoring logic



The scenario engine must be modular and expandable.



---



3?? Core Metrics System



* XP system (experience accumulation)

* Burnout metric (resource management variable)

* Case performance scoring

* Simple progression unlock logic



These systems must be database-driven and extendable.



---



 4?? Retention Foundation



* Basic spaced-repetition framework

* Ability to flag mistakes

* Ability to resurface prior weak areas



Full algorithm sophistication is NOT required in Phase 1 — but architecture must support future enhancement.



---



5?? Admin Panel



Create/edit cases

Define decision branches

Assign XP values

Attach educational resources

Publish/unpublish content



Content must be manageable without modifying code.



---



## Critical Requirement



This MVP must be built with long-term scalability in mind.



I do NOT want:



* Hardcoded logic

* Non-expandable case structures

* Architecture that forces rebuild for Phase 2



Database modeling and system design quality are more important than speed.



---



## Preferred Tech Stack



* Next.js (React + TypeScript)

* PostgreSQL

* Supabase (or equivalent backend service)

* Clean, modular architecture



Open to alternatives if justified with clear reasoning.



---



## Ideal Candidate



* Has built structured SaaS products

* Understands system scalability

* Can model branching logic cleanly

* Thinks in long-term architecture, not shortcuts

* Comfortable working under NDA



---



## Deliverables



* Deployed MVP

* Scenario engine

* XP + burnout system

* Basic progression logic

* Admin panel

* Documented architecture

* Clean, maintainable codebase



---



## Application Requirements



Please include:



1. Your proposed architecture approach for modular scenario systems

2. 2–3 examples of structured platforms you’ve built

3. Estimated MVP timeline

4. Fixed price or milestone-based proposal



Shortlisted candidates will sign NDA before receiving detailed feature breakdown.



Compensation will be determined based on the candidate’s experience, portfolio quality, and proposed technical architecture

title: Jewelry Collection Designer
description:
Makena is a Hawaii-based jewelry brand inspired by sun-warmed skin, salt air, effortless beauty, and everyday elegance. Our pieces are designed to be worn in the ocean, layered daily, and loved for years, not just a season.



We are looking for someone with a fashion background who deeply understands brand identity and can assist in designing collections that stay fully aligned with Makena’s aesthetic.



Before applying, please review our 
 our vibe is essential.



The Right Person for This Role



You understand how to:



Stay consistent with an established aesthetic



Build cohesive collections that feel intentional



Avoid chasing trends that don’t fit the brand



Refine ideas until they feel effortless, not over-designed



Makena is feminine but not fussy.

Elevated but not flashy.

On-trend but never trendy.

Coastal but not literal.



We are looking for someone who instinctively understands that balance.



How You’ll Work



We regularly curate and provide inspiration images, references, and directional concepts.



Your role will be to:



Use our curated inspiration as a starting point



Thoughtfully tweak, refine, and reinterpret designs



Adjust proportion, scale, finishes, and details



Build cohesive, production-ready collections from those references



This is not copy-and-paste design.

It’s about elevating inspiration into original, brand-aligned pieces that feel distinctly Makena.



Responsibilities



Design full jewelry collections aligned with Makena’s brand DNA



Create seasonal mood boards rooted in our aesthetic



Develop balanced assortments (statement + layering + core essentials)



Review samples to ensure they match both design intent and brand standards



Help evolve the brand while staying true to its core identity



Contribute to naming, collection themes, and storytelling



Qualifications



Strong portfolio showing any previous fashion work



We mainly collaborate in Figma.



Strong sense of proportion, scale, and layering



How to Apply:

Please submit your portfolio showcasing your illustration work, patterns, and any relevant design projects, along with your resume and a brief cover letter.



Job Type:

Part-time possible

Please
 me at

title: AI Video Ad Creator — Per-Video Pay + $25 Bonus Per Winning Ad + Path to Full-Time
description:
AI Video Ad Creator — Per-Video Pay + $25 Bonus Per Winning Ad + Path to Full-Time

$386–$491 USD/Month

(based on 20 concepts/month at 5 videos/week — actual earnings depend on format mix)



BEFORE APPLYING: Complete the trial task linked here ? 
/document/d/1MgiwSDTmUI8OO37bc4O8DlQ0UrpvSdU071vXuehrlmY/edit?usp=sharing. 

**Applications without a completed trial task will not be reviewed.**

**The selected candidate will be compensated for their trial task upon hiring.**



**$25 bonus for every ad that hits $1K spend at target ROAS. No cap. As the brand scales, bonus milestones increase — your winning ads become worth more over time. Full-time position available as we scale.**



Hey, I'm Asad. I'm building e-commerce brands in the health and wellness space. I'm looking for an AI ad creator who's already proven — someone who's made winning ecom ads, knows their way around AI tools, and is ready to collect bonuses by creating ads that actually convert.



This isn't a traditional video editing role. You're not cutting YouTube videos or making corporate content. You're creating AI-powered direct-response ads that sell. I hand you a script and an inspo video. You build the entire ad. Your ads hit, you get bonuses. You stay consistent, your rates go up. You keep delivering, you move to full-time.



---



## How This Works



You’ll start with 5 videos/week.



**What I give you:**

- A finished script

- An inspo video — a winning ad to reference for style, format, and pacing

- Occasional notes if I want a specific editing style or approach



**What you handle — everything else:**

- Study the inspo video and reverse-engineer the format

- Generate all AI content — avatars, b-roll, voiceover, visual assets

- Source b-roll footage as needed

- Full assembly — pacing, cutaways, text overlays, transitions

- Final polish and delivery



I write the strategy and the scripts. You bring them to life.



---



## What You'll Be Creating



You’ll start with 5 videos/week. Every ad is different. Some concepts will be a HeyGen talking head with b-roll sprinkled throughout. Some will be a Sora-generated hook for the first 15 seconds with Kling 2.6 b-roll for the rest. Some will use sourced social media footage with AI voiceover. The concept changes — your job is to execute whatever the brief calls for.



**AI tools you'll be using:** HeyGen, Gemini, Enhancor, Sora, Kling 2.6, ElevenLabs. You should already be familiar with these or similar tools.



** Sourcing B-roll** TikTok, Instagram, Kalodata, Youtube



**Content lengths range from 30 seconds to 4 minutes**, depending on the concept — short-form ads, mid-length authority ads, and longer VSLs.



---



## What I Expect From the Ads You Create



Our ads don't do surface-level agitation. We don't mention a pain point once and move on to the product. We go deep. The tension in the ad should build as the video progresses — second 40 should feel heavier than second 10. Every round deeper into the ad should raise the emotional stakes.



Then — and only then — there should be a feeling of relief as the solution is introduced. The viewer should feel the weight lift. That contrast between deep tension and genuine relief is what makes our ads convert.



The visuals you source and generate need to match this emotional arc. Not random footage — visuals that amplify the tension during agitation and feel like a release during the solution.



---



## Who I'm Looking For



### Requirements (Non-Negotiable)



- Proven experience creating winning ecommerce ads — show me your results, not just a portfolio. Ad spend, ROAS, revenue you've helped drive.

- Strong experience with AI ad creation tools — you should already be using HeyGen, Sora, Kling, Gemini, ElevenLabs, or similar tools regularly. Not "willing to learn." Already using them.

- Understanding of direct-response ad structure: hook ? problem ? deep agitation ? solution ? CTA

- Ability to source and generate all visual assets independently — I give you the script and inspo. You create everything else.

- Portfolio showing ecommerce ad work — not general editing, not music videos, not vlogs

- Strong English comprehension — you'll be reading scripts and briefs daily

- Reliable internet connection and your own editing setup



### Mindset & Character



- **You think like a marketer, not just an editor.** You understand hooks, pattern interrupts, desire, objections, and CTAs. You watch ads and think about why they work or why they don't.

- **Results over aesthetics.** You care about whether the ad converted, not whether it just looks pretty. When something doesn't work, you're curious about why.

- **Hungry.** You're not here to coast. You want to create winners, stack bonuses, and grow into a full-time role.

- **Coachable.** You take feedback as fuel, not criticism. When something's not working, you figure out what to do differently.

- **Self-directed.** I give you a script and an inspo video. You take it from there without needing your hand held through every decision.

- **Fast without cutting corners.** Good quality always. But you don't take three days on a one-day task either.



### Nice to Have (Not Required)



- Health and wellness niche ad experience

- Static ad design skills

- Understanding of direct-response copywriting principles

- Experience with market sophistication and awareness level targeting



---



## Who Should NOT Apply



**Do not apply if:**



- You have no experience creating ecommerce or direct-response ads — this is not a training role

- You've never worked with AI tools like HeyGen, Sora, or Kling

- You don't understand ad structure — if "hook ? problem ? agitation ? solution ? CTA" doesn't mean anything to you, this isn't the right fit

- You want gentle feedback — I give direct, honest feedback because that's how we get better ads

- You work slowly and can't deliver consistently

- You want an easy, low-pressure gig

- You just follow instructions and never think for yourself



If you've read all of this and you're more excited, not less — keep reading. You're the person I'm looking for.



---



## Compensation



**Pay per concept based on video length:**



30-60 seconds: $7 per concept

1-2 minutes: $14 per concept

2-3 minutes: $20 per concept

3-4 minutes: $25 per concept



Variations of winning ads are priced at half rate.



**Performance bonus:** $25 for every winning ad — any ad that hits $1,000 in spend at our target ROAS. No cap. Create 5 winners in a month, that's $125 in bonuses on top of your concept pay. Create 10, that's $250.



**Rate increases:** Deliver consistently and your per-concept rates go up. Simple — better work, better pay.



**Path to full-time:** This starts as per-concept work. As the brand scales and ad volume increases, this becomes a full-time salaried position for the right person.



--



## Team & How We Work



Small team — me, you, and our creative strategist. We move fast, take big swings, and do everything with high intent. I'm here to support you every day with scripts, inspo videos, feedback, and creative direction.



Daily communication via WhatsApp. You submit work, I give feedback, you iterate, we test. Fast loops — you'll always know how your ads performed.



---



## How to Apply



**Submit the following:**



1. **Portfolio link** — Ecommerce and direct-response ad work only. Show me AI-generated ads, Meta ads, any ads you've created that actually performed. Include performance data if you have it — spend, ROAS, revenue. Do not send general editing reels.



2. **Completed trial task** — Attached is a creative brief with a script and an inspo video. Build the ad. Your application will not be considered without a completed trial task.



3. **Short introduction video (1-2 minutes)** — Optional but powerful. Introduce yourself, show me your best work, and tell me why you're the right fit.



4. **Answer these questions in your application:**

- How many ecommerce ads have you created in the last 6 months?

- What AI tools do you use regularly for ad creation?

- Show me your best-performing ad — what was the spend and ROAS?

- Describe the structure of a high-converting direct-response video ad.



---



I'm looking for someone who's already proven, already using AI tools, and ready to create winning ads. You get paid per concept, you earn bonuses when your ads win, your rates increase as you prove yourself, and this grows into a full-time role as we scale.





No cap on bonuses. No ceiling on growth. You create winners, everybody wins.



If that's you — apply.



— Asad

title: AI Automation/ Marketing/ Executive Assistant
description:
Are you tired of part-time gigs? 



**STOP. Please do not apply for this job hoping to get lucky. IF YOU DO NOT meet at least 80% of the Ideal Candidate parameters, do not waste your time or mine.** 



Are you tired of not knowing how much you will make each month as a base salary? Not having the opportunity to significantly increase your income based on effort and brainpower? Juggling multiple part-time jobs? Being treated like a contract worker instead of a true business partner? Interested in building long-term skills to navigate the future degradation of the VA industry due to AI?



This may be the opportunity for you.



With me, you have the opportunity to grow into a career that will evolve and last for years, and you will only have to work for me.



I only ask ONE thing. During the hours we agree on, you work for no one else but me.



I am a highly successful real estate agent. I am the fastest-growing real estate agent in the area since sales data began to be recorded. I have a strong entrepreneurial mindset and high expectations. I am also more generous and kind to those whom I bring into my circle.



The IDEAL candidate:

1. Communication and Growth

-High level of English proficiency, with strong verbal and written communication skills

-Strong listening skills and the ability to follow instructions carefully

-Coachable, with a desire to learn, improve from mistakes, and handle direct feedback well



2. Technology, Systems, and Problem-Solving

-Personally interested in technology, with genuine curiosity about new tools and systems

-A quick learner with new software, and able to troubleshoot basic tech issues independently

-Interested in AI, LLMs, automation, and efficiency, with a desire to turn manual tasks into smarter systems

-Strong problem-solving skills and good judgment, including researching answers before asking and making small decisions independently

-Highly organized and detail-oriented, with the ability to spot inconsistencies, missing steps, and errors

title: Creative Strategist & Media Buyer (Meta Ads / Facebook Ads — eCommerce)
description:
We are a fast-scaling eCommerce dropshipping operation running multiple stores across Europe and the US doing €100K / Month. We are looking for a sharp Creative Strategist & Media Buyer who understands how to find winning creative angles, brief content creators, analyze ad performance, and scale what works.

This is not an execution-only role. We want someone who thinks strategically about why ads win or lose — and can build a system around that thinking.

If you have worked inside a serious eCommerce brand or agency managing €50K+/month in Meta ad spend and you understand the relationship between creative strategy and paid performance, we want to hear from you.

Responsibilities:



Research competitors using
 Ads Library, Minea, Atria, or similar tools

Identify winning creative patterns: hooks, formats, copy angles, offer structures

Brief creative production (static collages, video, UGC) with clear strategic direction

Analyze ad performance in Meta Ads Manager and third-party tracking tools

Identify winning and losing creatives based on CTR, hook rate, CPA, and ROAS

Make data-driven decisions on what to iterate, what to kill, and what to scale

Maintain a creative swipe file and testing log

Communicate findings and recommendations clearly via Slack with weekly reporting



Requirements (Non-Negotiable):



Proven Meta Ads experience managing €10K+/month in ad spend for eCommerce

Experience with creative research tools (Ads Library, Ad Spy, Atria, Foreplay or similar)

Strong understanding of direct response creative — hooks, offers, copy structure

Ability to brief creatives with clear strategic rationale not just aesthetic preferences

Comfortable reading ad data and making scaling/killing decisions independently

Clear written English and structured async communication



Nice to Have:



Experience with jewelry, fashion, or accessories categories

Familiarity with Wetracked, Triplewhale, or other attribution tools

Understanding of Advantage+ Shopping Campaigns and CBO structure

Experience scaling stores from €10K/day to €30K+/day on Meta



To apply, please answer the following:



Walk me through how you would structure a Meta ads account for a jewelry store doing €100K/month looking to scale to €500k-1M Months. Be specific about campaign structure, creative testing process, and scaling logic.

What creative research process do you follow before launching a new product? Which tools do you use and what signals tell you a product is worth testing?

Describe a campaign you scaled past €1K/day on Meta. What was the product, what was the structure, and what creative format drove the results?

How do you d
 when a creative is ready to scale vs when to kill it? What specific metrics do you use as thresholds?

What tracking setup do you recommend for a store experiencing Meta attribution issues post-iOS14?

title: AI Video Ad Creator — Per-Video Pay + $25 Bonus Per Winning Ad + Path to Full-Time
description:
AI Video Ad Creator — Per-Video Pay + $25 Bonus Per Winning Ad + Path to Full-Time

22,000–28,000/month 

(based on 20 concepts/month at 5 videos/week — actual earnings depend on format mix)



BEFORE APPLYING: Complete the trial task linked here ? 
/document/d/1MgiwSDTmUI8OO37bc4O8DlQ0UrpvSdU071vXuehrlmY/edit?usp=sharing. 

**Applications without a completed trial task will not be reviewed.**

**The selected candidate will be compensated for their trial task upon hiring.**



**$25 bonus for every ad that hits $1K spend at target ROAS. No cap. As the brand scales, bonus milestones increase — your winning ads become worth more over time. Full-time position available as we scale.**



Hey, I'm Asad. I'm building e-commerce brands in the health and wellness space. I'm looking for an AI ad creator who's already proven — someone who's made winning ecom ads, knows their way around AI tools, and is ready to collect bonuses by creating ads that actually convert.



This isn't a traditional video editing role. You're not cutting YouTube videos or making corporate content. You're creating AI-powered direct-response ads that sell. I hand you a script and an inspo video. You build the entire ad. Your ads hit, you get bonuses. You stay consistent, your rates go up. You keep delivering, you move to full-time.



---



## How This Works



You’ll start with 5 videos/week.



**What I give you:**

- A finished script

- An inspo video — a winning ad to reference for style, format, and pacing

- Occasional notes if I want a specific editing style or approach



**What you handle — everything else:**

- Study the inspo video and reverse-engineer the format

- Generate all AI content — avatars, b-roll, voiceover, visual assets

- Source b-roll footage as needed

- Full assembly — pacing, cutaways, text overlays, transitions

- Final polish and delivery



I write the strategy and the scripts. You bring them to life.



---



## What You'll Be Creating



You’ll start with 5 videos/week. Every ad is different. Some concepts will be a HeyGen talking head with b-roll sprinkled throughout. Some will be a Sora-generated hook for the first 15 seconds with Kling 2.6 b-roll for the rest. Some will use sourced social media footage with AI voiceover. The concept changes — your job is to execute whatever the brief calls for.



**AI tools you'll be using:** HeyGen, Gemini, Enhancor, Sora, Kling 2.6, ElevenLabs. You should already be familiar with these or similar tools.



** Sourcing B-roll** TikTok, Instagram, Kalodata, Youtube



**Content lengths range from 30 seconds to 4 minutes**, depending on the concept — short-form ads, mid-length authority ads, and longer VSLs.



---



## What I Expect From the Ads You Create



Our ads don't do surface-level agitation. We don't mention a pain point once and move on to the product. We go deep. The tension in the ad should build as the video progresses — second 40 should feel heavier than second 10. Every round deeper into the ad should raise the emotional stakes.



Then — and only then — there should be a feeling of relief as the solution is introduced. The viewer should feel the weight lift. That contrast between deep tension and genuine relief is what makes our ads convert.



The visuals you source and generate need to match this emotional arc. Not random footage — visuals that amplify the tension during agitation and feel like a release during the solution.



---



## Who I'm Looking For



### Requirements (Non-Negotiable)



- Proven experience creating winning ecommerce ads — show me your results, not just a portfolio. Ad spend, ROAS, revenue you've helped drive.

- Strong experience with AI ad creation tools — you should already be using HeyGen, Sora, Kling, Gemini, ElevenLabs, or similar tools regularly. Not "willing to learn." Already using them.

- Understanding of direct-response ad structure: hook ? problem ? deep agitation ? solution ? CTA

- Ability to source and generate all visual assets independently — I give you the script and inspo. You create everything else.

- Portfolio showing ecommerce ad work — not general editing, not music videos, not vlogs

- Strong English comprehension — you'll be reading scripts and briefs daily

- Reliable internet connection and your own editing setup



### Mindset & Character



- **You think like a marketer, not just an editor.** You understand hooks, pattern interrupts, desire, objections, and CTAs. You watch ads and think about why they work or why they don't.

- **Results over aesthetics.** You care about whether the ad converted, not whether it just looks pretty. When something doesn't work, you're curious about why.

- **Hungry.** You're not here to coast. You want to create winners, stack bonuses, and grow into a full-time role.

- **Coachable.** You take feedback as fuel, not criticism. When something's not working, you figure out what to do differently.

- **Self-directed.** I give you a script and an inspo video. You take it from there without needing your hand held through every decision.

- **Fast without cutting corners.** Good quality always. But you don't take three days on a one-day task either.



### Nice to Have (Not Required)



- Health and wellness niche ad experience

- Static ad design skills

- Understanding of direct-response copywriting principles

- Experience with market sophistication and awareness level targeting



---



## Who Should NOT Apply



**Do not apply if:**



- You have no experience creating ecommerce or direct-response ads — this is not a training role

- You've never worked with AI tools like HeyGen, Sora, or Kling

- You don't understand ad structure — if "hook ? problem ? agitation ? solution ? CTA" doesn't mean anything to you, this isn't the right fit

- You want gentle feedback — I give direct, honest feedback because that's how we get better ads

- You work slowly and can't deliver consistently

- You want an easy, low-pressure gig

- You just follow instructions and never think for yourself



If you've read all of this and you're more excited, not less — keep reading. You're the person I'm looking for.



---



## Compensation



**Pay per concept based on video length:**



30-60 seconds: $7 per concept

1-2 minutes: $14 per concept

2-3 minutes: $20 per concept

3-4 minutes: $25 per concept



Variations of winning ads are priced at half rate.



**Performance bonus:** $25 for every winning ad — any ad that hits $1,000 in spend at our target ROAS. No cap. Create 5 winners in a month, that's $125 in bonuses on top of your concept pay. Create 10, that's $250.



**Rate increases:** Deliver consistently and your per-concept rates go up. Simple — better work, better pay.



**Path to full-time:** This starts as per-concept work. As the brand scales and ad volume increases, this becomes a full-time salaried position for the right person.



--



## Team & How We Work



Small team — me, you, and our creative strategist. We move fast, take big swings, and do everything with high intent. I'm here to support you every day with scripts, inspo videos, feedback, and creative direction.



Daily communication via WhatsApp. You submit work, I give feedback, you iterate, we test. Fast loops — you'll always know how your ads performed.



---



## How to Apply



**Submit the following:**



1. **Portfolio link** — Ecommerce and direct-response ad work only. Show me AI-generated ads, Meta ads, any ads you've created that actually performed. Include performance data if you have it — spend, ROAS, revenue. Do not send general editing reels.



2. **Completed trial task** — Attached is a creative brief with a script and an inspo video. Build the ad. Your application will not be considered without a completed trial task.



3. **Short introduction video (1-2 minutes)** — Optional but powerful. Introduce yourself, show me your best work, and tell me why you're the right fit.



4. **Answer these questions in your application:**

- How many ecommerce ads have you created in the last 6 months?

- What AI tools do you use regularly for ad creation?

- Show me your best-performing ad — what was the spend and ROAS?

- Describe the structure of a high-converting direct-response video ad.



---



I'm looking for someone who's already proven, already using AI tools, and ready to create winning ads. You get paid per concept, you earn bonuses when your ads win, your rates increase as you prove yourself, and this grows into a full-time role as we scale.





No cap on bonuses. No ceiling on growth. You create winners, everybody wins.



If that's you — apply.



— Asad

title: Corporate Sales Manager – Real Estate Solutions

.sg

Why Join Acuvest :



Your Mission :

This is a full-stack business development and sales role with plenty of room to use your skillsets in sales, strategy, innovation and execution. You’ll lead a motivated team and collaborate closely with other departments. You will report to the Business Development / Sales Director and play a critical role in the company’s performance. 



Why Join us :



- Mentored by management of a company with decades of experience in investment management, property management, development, and self-storage solutions across Singapore and the region. We combine strategic insight with innovation, offering real opportunities to grow and make an impact across a diversified real estate portfolio.



- Build an Elite Network: Connect directly with a high-value network of Corporate and SME business leaders / decision-makers, building a powerful network for your long-term career success. 



- Thrive in a High-Growth Self-Storage Sector. Our self-storage business, Co-working business space, E-commerce fulfilment hubs, serve both individual and corporate clients with flexible space solutions in a fast-rising market. You’ll be at the forefront of lead generation, networking, and deal closing—driving measurable results in an expanding industry.



- Collaborative Culture. Real Career Progression. Work with experienced professionals across property and investment teams, gain exposure to full deal cycles, build strong client relationships, and accelerate your career in sales and business development at Acuvest.



Full job description : What you will be doing



Property Leasing : 



- Develop and implement leasing strategies and initiatives to maximize occupancy, rental income, and tenant satisfaction 



- Identify leasing opportunities and prospective tenants that align with the positioning and target market of each property, and develop relationships with tenants and prospective tenants. 



- Negotiate lease agreements, including terms and conditions, rental rates, lease incentives, and lease renewals, and ensure compliance with company policies and industry standards. 



- Collaborate with property management teams to conduct market research and analysis, assess competitive landscape, and identify trends and opportunities in the property market. 



- Develop and maintain leasing budgets, forecasts, and reports, and track leasing activity, occupancy rates, and financial performance against targets and benchmarks. 



- Manage tenant relations and communication, including addressing tenant inquiries, resolving disputes, and ensuring tenant compliance with lease terms and property rules and regulations. 



- Represent the company at industry events, trade shows, and networking opportunities to promote our properties and attract potential tenants and partners. 



Self storage sales : 



- Work closely self storage sales team and management on drive the sales and occupancy of our self storage business. 



Property Investment : 



- Work closely with Management team to develop business opportunities for new property investment and development projects on a project basis.

title: Senior HubSpot Sales Operations Manager (CRM Pipelines & Automation)
description:
IMPORTANT – Please Read Before Applying



This is NOT a general virtual assistant role.



We are only interested in applicants with real, hands-on HubSpot CRM experience supporting active sales teams and managing pipelines daily.



If your experience is mainly social media, admin support, or
 marketing, this role will not be a fit.



—-



About The Role



The Door Centre Galway is a fast-growing Irish showroom and joinery business receiving a high daily volume of enquiries through Meta ads, WhatsApp, phone, and website leads.



We are hiring a full-time HubSpot Sales Operations Manager to take ownership of our CRM, lead flow, automation, and sales coordination so our showroom closers can focus on selling.



You will act as the operational controller behind our sales system.



—-



Core Responsibilities



HubSpot CRM Ownership

 • Manage HubSpot daily as the central sales operations platform

 • Maintain pipelines, deal stages, and ownership rules

 • Monitor incoming leads and ensure fast first contact

 • Maintain high data quality and structured CRM processes

 • Prevent duplicate contacts and stale deals



Lead Flow & Coordination

 • Review incoming leads fro
ta ads, website forms, WhatsApp, and calls

 • Send approved WhatsApp/email first-touch messages

 • Qualify enquiries (homeowner vs builder/trade)

 • Assign leads to the correct sales closer

 • Ensure follow-ups are scheduled and completed



Automation & Workflow Management

 • Build and maintain HubSpot workflows, sequences, and task automation

 • Improve response speed and conversion processes

 • Support WhatsApp integration within HubSpot

 • Suggest improvements to our sales systems



Sales Operations Support

 • Identify stalled deals and notify the sales team

 • Track pipeline health and activity

 • Provide simple weekly reporting to management



—-



What This Role Is NOT

 • You will NOT be responsible for closing sales

 • You will NOT negotiate pricing or speak technically about products

 • You will NOT run marketing campaigns or social media



Your focus is CRM operations, lead coordination, and sales structure.



—-



Required Experience (Non-Negotiable)

 • Proven hands-on experience managing HubSpot for a sales-driven business

 • Strong understanding of Deals, Contacts, Companies, Pipelines, and Workflows

 • Experience supporting or coordinating active sales teams

 • Ability to manage high lead volumes daily

 • Excellent written English communication skills

 • Able to work independently and take ownership



—-



Preferred Experience

 • WhatsApp integration within a CRM

 • Sales Operations / Revenue Operations background

 • Experience in construction, home improvement, retail, or trade environments



—-



Working Style We Expect

 • Highly organised and process-driven

 • Confident managing systems without constant supervision

 • Ownership mindset — not just task-based

 • Comfortable working aligned with Irish business hours



—-



Compensation



Full-time remote position with competitive salary based on proven HubSpot Sales Operations experience.



Expected range: ph55,000 – ph85,000 per month depending on seniority and hands-on HubSpot expertise.

($1000 - $1500)



This is a long-term role with a growing Irish business — not a short-term VA position.



—-



Application Instructions (Important)



To be considered, please include:

 1. A short Loom/video introduction explaining your HubSpot experience.

 2. Examples of pipelines, workflows, or automation you have personally built.

 3. Confirmation you can work aligned to Irish business hours.

 4. Start your application with the word PIPELINE so we know you have read the full job description.



Applications that do not follow these instructions will not be reviewed.

title: Finance Manager
description:
We are seeking an experienced Finance Manager, International to lead financial planning and analysis for international markets. This role serves as a key business partner to cross-functional leaders, driving budgeting, forecasting, reporting, and strategic financial insights across global regions.



The ideal candidate combines strong analytical expertise with strategic thinking and the ability to translate financial data into actionable recommendations that support growth and operational efficiency.



Responsibilities:



Lead annual budgeting and monthly forecasting processes for international markets, ensuring alignment with company objectives

Conduct in-depth financial analysis to assess business performance, trends, and growth opportunities

Perform budget-to-actual variance analysis and clearly communicate key drivers to leadership

Develop and maintain financial models to support scenario planning and long-term strategy

Provide decision support to leadership through financial insights and performance analysis

Partner with regional and country leaders to develop and track KPIs

Prepare and present management reports highlighting key financial metrics and trends

Collaborate cross-functionally, including close partnership with Accounting during monthly close cycles

Conduct ad hoc analysis to support strategic initiatives and business decisions

Identify and implement process improvements within FP&A workflows to increase efficiency and accuracy



Requirements:



Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Accounting, or related field; MBA or advanced degree preferred

4–6 years of FP&A experience

Strong expertise in budgeting, forecasting, variance analysis, and financial modeling

Experience building three-statement financial models and cash flow forecasts is strongly preferred

Proficiency in Excel and financial analysis tools

Strong analytical, problem-solving, and data interpretation skills

Excellent communication and presentation skills

Experience partnering with cross-functional and international stakeholders

Strategic mindset with the ability to convert financial data into business insights

title: Virtual Assistant – Podcast & Light Bookkeeping Support (Part-Time with chance for FT)
description:
A growing U.S.-based Fractional CFO firm specializing in service-based businesses is hiring a part-time Virtual Assistant.



This role focuses on two primary areas:

 1. Podcast guest research and coordination

 2. Light bookkeeping support for select clients



This is a long-term position for someone dependable and detail-oriented.



Hours & Pay

 • 10–20 hours per week to start

 • $5–$8 per hour depending on experience

 • Must overlap at least 3–4 hours daily with U.S. Pacific Time

 • Weekly video check-in required



Primary Responsibilities



1) Podcast Guest Research (High Priority)



The firm produces a weekly podcast focused on business owners in the trades and service industries.



Responsibilities include:

 • Research potential podcast guests in HVAC, plumbing, electrical, and related industries

 • Identify qualified owners, operators, consultants, and industry experts

 • Create short research briefs for internal review

 • Maintain a structured guest pipeline tracker

 • Track episode production and release calendar

 • Deliver short-form video clips to guests after episodes are published

 • Maintain organized folders for transcripts, clips, and media assets



You will not book meetings or manage
 communication. All guest communication is handled internally. Your role is research, preparation, organization, and follow-up tracking.



2) Light Bookkeeping Support (High Priority)



The firm provides CFO services to service-based businesses and requires support with structured bookkeeping tasks.



Responsibilities include:

 • Reconcile bank and credit card accounts in QuickBooks Online

 • Categorize transactions based on defined chart of accounts

 • Match deposits and clear transactions

 • Upload and organize receipts

 • Prepare monthly financial exports for review

 • Flag unusual transactions or balance sheet items for review



You will not make accounting decisions or post journal entries without approval. Your role is preparation and organization. Final review and accounting judgment remain with the CFO.



Secondary Responsibilities (As Needed)

 • Draft show notes from podcast transcripts

 • Identify 8–10 strong short-form video clip timestamps per episode

 • Assist with scheduling podcast uploads

 • Maintain client status dashboards

 • Document and update standard operating procedures

 • Maintain organized internal tracking systems in spreadsheets or Notion



Required Skills

 • Strong written English

 • High attention to detail

 • Experience with QuickBooks Online

 • Comfortable working with spreadsheets

 • Able to follow structured processes

 • Comfortable asking questions when unsure

 • Stable internet connection and quiet workspace



Personality Fit

 • Detail-oriented and precise

 • Dependable and consistent

 • Comfortable working behind the scenes

 • Proactive but does not overstep

 • Willing to follow defined systems



Application Instructions



To apply:

 1. Record a short 2–3 minute Loom video introducing yourself.

 2. Describe your QuickBooks Online experience.

 3. Explain how you would research strong podcast guests in a specific industry.



Begin your application with the words: “Detail matters.”

With over 30 years of experience in sign manufacturing and metal fabrication, we pride ourselves on craftsmanship, attention to detail, and exceptional customer service. We sell across multiple e-commerce platforms and require multiple graphic designers for product development, social media, customer service- providing mockups and fulfillment of orders, and website product development.



We are seeking a versatile Graphic Designer with proven experience in custom laser-cut metal sign design and Amazon A+ content creation to join our Philippines-based design team on a project-based or ongoing basis.  You will join our team of 10+ in-house designers 

You must be able to design and create an original design that is ready for laser cutting, and then create the product images for Etsy, Shopify, and Amazon. All mockups and product images must be life-like and realistic.



MUST be able to create joined VECTOR LINE ART

Convert raster to vector images, understand color theory, create lifestyle scenes, photo-real product images to a lifestyle background, create A+ content, and social posts. -



Please send examples of your work. EXAMPLES are required for the interview.



Key Responsibilities

• Create to-scale, life-like product listing images for custom indoor and outdoor metal signs.

• Design vector-ready artwork for laser cutting, ensuring precision and manufacturability.

• Completing customer orders using a templated vectorized dxf file.

• Develop Amazon A+ content layouts that effectively showcase product features, benefits, and lifestyle applications.

• Work with product dimensions, color swatches, and textures to produce accurate, visually appealing mockups.

• Collaborate with marketing and production teams to maintain brand consistency.

• Optimize product listing images for Etsy, Amazon, Shopify, and other e-commerce platforms.





Qualifications

• Proven experience designing custom laser-cut metal signs or similar vector-based manufacturing products.

• Proficiency in Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop, and vector graphic creation.

• Knowledge of Amazon A+ Content guidelines and best practices.

• Ability to create realistic product renderings with correct scale, proportion, and color representation.

• Strong attention to detail and excellent time management skills.

• Experience with e-commerce product photography/mockups (preferred).





Preferred Skills

• Experience in visualizing powder-coated finishes, textures, and multiple color variations.

• Familiarity with Etsy, Shopify, and Amazon Seller Central image requirements.

• Understanding of manufacturing tolerances for laser cutting and metal fabrication.





Contract Details

• $ 3 per hour starting pay-

• Hours will be 25 to 30 hours a week, based on workload, to start.  ( hours could be up to 60 hours per week as needed) 

• Schedule: 11 PM to 5 AM GMT

• Monday to Friday USA days ( Tuesday to Saturday Philippine Work Days)

• Location: Remote – Philippines only (Philippine-based applicants).

• Requirements: Contract, NDA, Wise payment account, Timeproof time tracker, and daily timesheet.

• Paid weekly via Wise 

• Team: You will be working with our Philippines-based design team- in a remote capacity



----------------------------------------How to apply:--------------------------------------------------------

Please
:





Please include:



link to your online jobs profile- we only hire Filipino-based contractors, do not apply if you are based in other countries.

Resume

Portfolio

Include the Position that you are applying for

A brief detail about yourself and why you are best suited for the job.

When you are available to start if hired.

Acknowledgement that you read the job posting, including salary, work hours, NDA time, and attendance requirements.



Note: Please note if we accept your application, you will be required to interview within 24 hours.  These are immediate fill positions.

title: Part-Time Remote Administrative Assistant (Phones & Multitasking Required)
description:
Part-Time Remote Administrative Assistant (Phones & Multitasking Required)



Please answer all employer questions to be considered



OnStage School of Music – U.S.-Based Music Lesson Company



Location: Remote – Philippines

Schedule:



Monday–Friday: 2:00 PM – 8:30 PM EST



Weekend rotation required:



Saturday: 8:30 AM – 5:00 PM EST



Sunday: 11:00 AM – 7:30 PM EST



About OnStage



OnStage School of Music is a family-run, joy-filled music school based in the United States. We serve students of all ages and focus on creating a positive, organized, and welcoming experience for every family.



Our admin team is fast-paced, collaborative, and highly communication-driven. We value accuracy, professionalism, and clear thinking—especially during busy 
nts.



The Role



We are seeking a Part-Time Remote Administrative Assistant who is comfortable on the phones, confident speaking with U.S. parents, and skilled at multitasking in a busy environment.



This role supports daily school operations and works closely with both in-studio and remote tea
mbers. You will be handling real-time communication while managing multiple tasks, so strong focus and clear communication are essential.



- Key Responsibilities



Answering and handling phone calls with parents professionally and confidently



Scheduling lessons and maintaining accurate student records



Assisting parents with scheduling, billing questions, and makeup lessons via phone, text, and



Coordinating with teachers regarding schedule changes and student updates



Supporting weekend operations remotely



Assisting with administrative projects, organization, and internal updates



- Qualifications



Excellent spoken and written English (clear pronunciation and professional tone required)



Comfortable handling frequent phone calls with U.S.-based parents



Strong multitasking and organizational skills



Ability to stay calm, accurate, and friendly in a fast-paced environment



Reliable computer, noise-free headset, and stable high-speed internet



Proficiency with Google Workspace, Microsoft Word, and spreadsheets



Positive attitude, strong work ethic, and team-oriented mindset



Consistent availability during all listed hours



- Why Work with OnStage



Supportive, kind, and structured team environment



Fully remote role with clear systems and training



Opportunity to learn a complete U.S.-based admin operation



Long-term growth potential for strong performers



Be part of a company that helps students and families love music



How to Apply



To be considered, all steps below are required:



1 Submit a short intro video explaining why you would be a great fit specifically for OnStage School of Music

2 Submit your 3-minute typing test result (medium text) from 

3 Send your weekly work availability, confirming you can work all required hours



Applications missing any of the above will not be considered.



We look forward to meeting our next tea
mber who can help keep our school running smoothly and our families feeling supported.

title: Executive/Virtual Assistant
description:
I'm an online fitness coach who works with shift workers and I’m looking for 2 highly organised, proactive Virtual Assistant to help with messaging, lead follow-up, and day-to-day admin.



This is a remote position working directly with me, with potential to grow hours and responsibilities as the business scales.



Your responsibilities will include:

Messaging new and existing followers to build rapport and book in calls

Sending free guides/resources via Instagram/
 and
 

Following up with leads (using a CRM or spreadsheet)

Tagging warm leads on social media

Scheduling posts on Instagram and TikTok

Messaging engaged followers + engaging with ideal client content (likes/comments)

Updating spreadsheets and client data

Sending a daily end-of-day recap report

Tracking simple business metrics (leads, calls booked, etc.)



You’re a great fit if you:

Have fluent written English (you’ll be doing a lot of messaging – scripts provided)

Are detail-oriented and don’t miss a beat when it comes to lead follow-up

Take initiative without waiting to be told what to do

Follow systems and SOPs with consistency

Are confident with Instagram, Google Sheets, and basic task tools like Notion or Trello



Hours:

Ideally 20-40 hours/week

Must be available during UK hours: 8am–12pm + 6pm–10pm GMT



How to apply:

Find my Instagram (my name’s Josh and I coach shift workers)



Send me a DM telling me what you like about my profile and why you would be good at this role.

If you’re shortlisted, I’ll book a Zoom call to chat further



PS if you use AI to create and send your job advert you won't be considered



Deliverables

Your responsibilities will include:

Messaging new and existing followers to build rapport and book in calls

Sending free guides/resources via Instagram DMs

Following up with leads (using a CRM or spreadsheet)

Tagging warm leads on Instagram

Scheduling posts on Instagram and TikTok

Managing my calendar and diary

Messaging engaged followers + engaging with ideal client content (likes/comments)

Updating spreadsheets and client data

Sending a daily end-of-day recap report

Tracking simple business metrics (leads, calls booked, etc.)
